sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_29a12c770f82320063318d8ce1050e51
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Clean Rapid Code Review Results</name><run_as display_value="">262c27ab0f02320063318d8ce1050e90</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2017-04-17 10:12:30</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 09:00:00</run_time><run_type>daily</run_type><script><![CDATA[var daysAgo = 7; // default if no property set in sys_properties
var sp = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
sp.addQuery('name', '=', 'x_snc_rcr.RCRResultsCleanUp');
sp.query();

while (sp.next()) {
	daysAgo = sp.getValue('value');
}

var reviews  = new GlideRecord('x_snc_rcr_review_results');
reviews.addQuery('sys_created_on', '<', gs.daysAgoStart(1));
reviews.addQuery('isnew', false);

reviews.query();
reviews.deleteMultiple();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rahulraviprasad</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-17 10:15:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>29a12c770f82320063318d8ce1050e51</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Clean Rapid Code Review Results</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_29a12c770f82320063318d8ce1050e51</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-26 15:53:06</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: ecc_agent_script_include_57997773db2d760043abfd441d961907
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_include"><ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>utility file sender from instance to mid server. </description><name>AttachmentSender</name><script><![CDATA[var AttachmentSender = Class.create();

AttachmentSender.prototype = {
   initialize : function() {
          this.debug = false;
      
      //If you would like to move processed files to a target location, set the next two parameters.
      //Make sure your file name ends up being unique. We will not overwrite a file by the same name
      //in the target directory...
      this.moveProcessedFiles = true;
      this.MIDSERVER_PROCESSED_FILE_PATH = "processed/";
      
      this.resLog = "FTP Log: n";
      this.log("InitializingtaRetriever");
      this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH = "work/";      
      this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME = probe.getParameter('targetFileName');
      
      this.Encoded_Data = probe.getParameter('encodedData');
      
      this.useProxy = this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.use_proxy");
      if (this.useProxy){
         this.proxyHost =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.host");
         this.proxyPort =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.port");
         this.proxyUser =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.username");
         this.proxyPass =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.password");
      }
      this.user = this.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.username");
      this.password = this.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.password");
      
      var ftpCredArr = this.decryptCredentials(probe.getParameter('ftpCred'));
      this.ftpUser = ftpCredArr[0];
      this.ftpPass = ftpCredArr[1];
      this.log('ftprname : '+ftpCredArr[0]);
      this.log('ftpsword : '+ftpCredArr[1]);
      this.ftpTargetServer = probe.getParameter('ftpTargetServer');
      this.ftpPort = (this.isANumber(probe.getParameter('ftpPort'))) ? (probe.getParameter('ftpPort')) : null;
      
      this.targetPath = probe.getParameter('targetPath');
      this.targetFileName = probe.getParameter('targetFileName');
      
      this.host = probe.getParameter('host');
      
      this.transportMethod = probe.getParameter('transportMethod');
      
       
   },
   
   getConfigParameter: function(parm){
      var m= Packages.com.service_now.mid.MIDServer.get();
      var config = m.getConfig();
      var res = config.getParameter(parm);
      var res2 = config.getProperty(parm);
      if (res){
         return res;
      }
      else if (res2){
         return res2;
      }
      else{
         config = Packages.com.service_now.mid.services.Config.get();
         return config.getProperty(parm);
      }
      
   },
   
   decryptCredentials: function(data) {
      var cred = new String(data);
      var e = new Packages.com.glide.util.Encrypter();
      
      var jsCred = cred + '';
      var usernamePass = e.decrypt(jsCred);
      var credArr = usernamePass.split(":", 2);
      return credArr;
   },
   
  saveToFile: function(data, targetPath) {
      var tmpLoc;
      try{
         if (this.transportMethod == "MID Server"){
            tmpLoc = targetPath;
         }
         else{
            tmpLoc = this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH + this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME;
         }
         var out = new Packages.java.io.PrintWriter(new Packages.java.io.FileWriter(tmpLoc));
		        var e = new Packages.com.glide.util.Encrypter();
		  
// 		  var x = new Packages.java.io.

  //       out.print(new GlideStringUtil().base64DecodeAsBytes(data));
//		  ms.log(new GlideStringUtil().base64DecodeAsBytes(data));
		  
		  out.print( new Packages.com.glide.util.StringUtil().base64Decode(data));
		 
		  ms.log(' testlog '+new Packages.com.glide.util.StringUtil().base64DecodeAsBytes(data));
         
         this.log("File saved to: " + tmpLoc);
      }
      catch(e){
         ms.log("Exception caught in SNDataRetriever->saveToFile: " + e.getMessage());
      }
	 // out.flush();
      out.close();
   },   
   
   execute: function() {
      var result = '';
     
      var pushRes = true;
      
      var saveRes = this.saveToFile(this.Encoded_Data, this.targetPath+ this.targetFileName);
      if(saveRes == true){
         pushRes = this.copyToFTP();
         result = "Sucess";
         //Move tmp file to a processed directory
         if (saveRes && pushRes && this.moveProcessedFiles){
            this.moveProcessedFile();
         }
      }
      else{
         result = "Failed";
         this.log("Thert was empty?");
      }
     return result;
   },
   
   type : "AttachmentSender"
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-24 05:28:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>57997773db2d760043abfd441d961907</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AttachmentSender</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_include_57997773db2d760043abfd441d961907</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-27 06:27:56</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection/><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>CodeReviewValidator</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gr = new GlideRecord('task');
	gr.query();
	
	gs.log('Now log the information');
	var count = gr.getRowCount();
	gs.info('Count = ' + count);

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_3d351afadbd93200c2f3717bbf9619e6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_rcr_review_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>FetchStoryDetails</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	// Add your code here
	
	var user = '';
	var pwd = '';

	try {
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('x_snc_rcr.StoryDetails', 'get');
		r.setStringParameterNoEscape('storyNumber',  current.story_number);
		
		user = gs.getProperty('x_snc_rcr.ProdUserName');
		pwd = gs.getProperty('x_snc_rcr.ProdUserPwd');
				
		r.setBasicAuth(user,pwd);
		
		var response = r.execute();
		var responseBody = response.getBody();
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		if(responseBody){
			var respJson = JSON.parse(responseBody);
			current.details = respJson.result[0].description;
			current.update();
		}
	}
	catch(ex) {
		gs.error('error occured'+ex);
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-08 09:41:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3d351afadbd93200c2f3717bbf9619e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FetchStoryDetails</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3d351afadbd93200c2f3717bbf9619e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-23 11:12:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3d351afadbd93200c2f3717bbf9619e6"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>sys_script</applied_to><definition><![CDATA["use strict";

//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
//     meta: {
//         docs: {
//             description: "disallow the use of empty blocks definations",
//             category: "Block",
//             recommended: true
//         },

//         schema: [{
//             type: "object",
//             properties: {
//                 typeof: {
//                     type: "boolean"
//                 }
//             },
//             additionalProperties: false
//         }]
//     },

//     create(context) {
//         const options = context.options[0];
//         var funcInfoStack = [];
//         const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;


        return {
            CallExpression(node) {
				
                if (node && node.type && node.callee && node.callee.object && node.callee.object.name && node.callee.property && node.callee.property.name && node.type === 'CallExpression' && node.callee.object.name === 'current' && node.callee.property.name == 'update') {
                    context.report(node.callee, 'Do not use current.update in before Business Rule');
                }
				
            }

        }

   // }
};
]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0011</number><rule_description>Are we avoiding use of current.update() on Before Business rule?</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_UPDATE_ON_CURRENT_IN_BEFORE_BR</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-14 11:42:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>da10fdb84fedf2004172fc728110c7cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0011</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_da10fdb84fedf2004172fc728110c7cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 15:18:27</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_acr_sources"><x_snc_rcr_acr_sources action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><environment>windows</environment><file_content>#!/usr/local/bin/php

<?php
error_reporting(0);
//Dependent Files

include_once('acr/configrulesync.php');

//API For ESLINT
class SLINT{

	protected $argument;
	protected $bFuncObj;

	/** Constructor ***/
	/*
    *   Initialize the variables
    *   Now grab the command line arguments  
	*/
	public function __construct($argv){

		$this->argument = $argv;
	}

	/*
	* Function 	:	updateConfigurationXML
	* Params 	:	$configFile: XML File,....
	* Output 	:	Update the configuration XML 
	*/
	public function updateConfigurationXML($configFile,$finalFFileName,$storedFolderName,$finalFileWExt,$sysID,$sys_created_on,$sys_updated_on){

		try{

			$xmlFile 		=   $configFile;
			$statarray 		= 	stat($finalFFileName);
	            			// Update the XML File
			$objDOM2  	= 	new DOMDocument();
			$objDOM2->load($xmlFile);
			$xml      	= 	simplexml_import_dom($objDOM2);
			
			$xmlFFolder = $xml->$storedFolderName->addChild("files");
			$xmlFFolder->addChild('file',$finalFileWExt);
			$xmlFFolder->addChild('sys_id',$sysID);
			$xmlFFolder->addChild('sys_created_on',strtotime($sys_created_on));
			$xmlFFolder->addChild('sys_updated_on',strtotime($sys_updated_on));
			$xmlFFolder->addChild('mTime',$statarray['mtime']);
			$xmlFFolder->addChild('CTime',$statarray['ctime']);
			$xml->asXML($xmlFile);

			unset($xmlFile);
			unset($statarray);
			unset($objDOM2);
			unset($xml);

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	}

	/*
	* Function 	:	updateConfigurationXML
	* Params 	:	$configFile: XML File,....
	* Output 	:	Update the configuration XML 
	*/
	public function updateConfigXML($configFile,$finalFFileName,$storedFolderName,$sysID,$sys_updated_on){

		try{

			$xmlFile 		=   $configFile;
			$statarray 		= 	stat($finalFFileName);
	            			// Update the XML File
			$objDOM2  	= 	new DOMDocument();
			$objDOM2->load($xmlFile);
			$xml      	= 	simplexml_import_dom($objDOM2);
			
			$insertfilesCounter = count($xml->$storedFolderName->files);
			for($insertkey=0;$insertkey<$insertfilesCounter;$insertkey++)
			{
				if($xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_id == $sysID){
					$xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->mTime = $statarray['mtime'];
					$xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_updated_on = @strtotime($sys_updated_on);
					$xml->asXML($xmlFile);
					break;
				 }
			}

			unset($xmlFile);
			unset($statarray);
			unset($objDOM2);
			unset($xml);

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	checkFile
	*	params   :  $phpXML : configuration.xml path, $storedFolderName: folderName, $indivSysID: sysID
	*   output   :  Returns the File Name for the SysID  
	*/
	public function checkFile($phpXml,$storedFolderName,$indivSysID){

		$xmlFile    =  $phpXml; 	
		$objDOM1  	=  new DOMDocument();
		$objDOM1->load($xmlFile);
		$xml 		= 	simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);


	    $insertfilesCounter =   count($xml->$storedFolderName->files);
	    $fileScriptFile 	= 	"";
	    $updatedTime    	= 	"";
	    $sysid 				=	"";
	    for($insertkey=0;$insertkey<$insertfilesCounter;$insertkey++){

				if($xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_id == $indivSysID){
					$fileScriptFile = $xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->file;
					$updatedTime    = $xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_updated_on;
					$sysid    = $xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_id;
					break;

			}
	   }
	   unset($xmlFile);
	   unset($objDOM1);
	   unset($xml);
	   unset($insertkey);
	   unset($insertfilesCounter);

	   if($fileScriptFile != "")
	   		return $fileScriptFile.":".$updatedTime.":".$sysid;
	   else
	   		return $fileScriptFile;


	}

	/*
	*	Function :	downloadJSON
	*	params   :  $baseString : authentication, $serverURL : url
	*   output   :  Returns the payload 
	*/
	public function downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL){

		try{

			$restAPI    		=   new REST_API;
			$sys_ver_response   =   $restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverURL);
			$downobj      	    =   json_decode($sys_ver_response,true);
			return $downobj;

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	deltaFile
	*	params   :  Null
	*   output   :  Update the delta XML with the last updated SysID 
	*/
	public function deltaFile(){
		
		try{

			$phpTree    		=   new CLint;
			$bFunc    			=   new BasicFunction;
			$restAPI    		=   new REST_API;

			$updateVersion 		= 	$phpTree->updateVersion;
			$deltaFile  		=   $phpTree->deltaFile;
			$serverURL    		=   $bFunc->ServiceUrl($updateVersion);
			$baseString			=	$bFunc->baseString();
			$obj          		=   $this->downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL); 
			$topmostSysID 		= 	$obj["result"][0]['sys_id'];
			$deltaValue 		= 	$restAPI->updateDeltaFile($deltaFile,$topmostSysID,$obj["result"][0]['sys_created_on'],$obj["result"][0]['sys_updated_on']);

			unset($phpTree);
			unset($bFunc);
			unset($restAPI);
			unset($updateVersion);
			unset($deltaFile);
			unset($obj);
			unset($deltaValue);

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}	
	}

	public function validateFile($validatecheck){

		//Grab the FileName Only
		try{

			$this->bFuncObj		=	new BasicFunction;
			$phpInit 			= 	new CLint;
			$restAPI    		=   new REST_API;


			$folderArr 	= 	$this->bFuncObj->folderValue();
	    	$snowArr	=	$this->bFuncObj->ComponentArray();
	    	$filep      =   urldecode($this->argument[1]);
			$fileArg	=	json_decode($filep,true); 
			$rulepath   =   $phpInit->eslintLoc; 
	    	//$fileCount 	=	explode(",",$fileArg);
	    	$finalJSON  =   array();
	    	$finalOutput =  "";
	    	$finalOutput1 = ""; 

	    	foreach($fileArg as $argKey=>$argVal){

	    		$indiv 		=	explode(",",$argVal);
	    		$indivFile 	=	$argKey;

	    		for($sysIdindex = 0; $sysIdindex < count($indiv); $sysIdindex++){

	    			$indivSysID =   $indiv[$sysIdindex];
	    			

	    			//Check whether it is a file
	    			if($this->checkSysID($indivSysID) 	==	1){

	    				
	    				//Check whether the folder already exists
	    				if($this->checkFileName($indivFile,$snowArr)){
	    					
	    					$storedFolderName 	= 	$folderArr[$snowArr[$indivFile]];
	    					$fileScriptFile 	= 	$this->checkFile($phpInit->xmlFile,$storedFolderName,$indivSysID);
	    					
							if($fileScriptFile != ""){
								
								$serverURL 		=	 $this->bFuncObj->ServiceUrl($snowArr[$indivFile]."/".$indivSysID);
								$baseString		=	 $this->bFuncObj->baseString();
								$downobj      	=    $this->downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL);

								$scripttypeArr  =    explode(":",$fileScriptFile);

								if(@strtotime($downobj['result']['sys_updated_on']) == $scripttypeArr[1]){
									$fullName 		= 	$phpInit->$storedFolderName."/".$scripttypeArr[0];
							    	$finalOutput 	=	$this->applyValidation($fullName,$rulepath,$validatecheck);
							    	$finalOutput1    =   $this->applySpecialValidation($fullName,$rulepath,$snowArr[$indivFile],$indivSysID,$indivFile);
								}
								else
								{
									$fullName 		= 	$phpInit->$storedFolderName."/".$scripttypeArr[0];
									$newFlag		=	$restAPI->fileWCreate($fullName,$downobj['result']['script']);

	            					if($newFlag	==	1){
	            						$this->updateConfigXML($phpInit->xmlFile,$fullName,$storedFolderName,$indivSysID,$downobj['result']['sys_updated_on']);
	            					}
			            		   	$finalOutput 	=	$this->applyValidation($fullName,$rulepath,$validatecheck);
			            		   	$finalOutput1   =   $this->applySpecialValidation($fullName,$rulepath,$snowArr[$indivFile],$indivSysID,$indivFile);	            					
								}
							
							}else{
								$serverURL 		=	 $this->bFuncObj->ServiceUrl($snowArr[$indivFile]."/".$indivSysID);
								$baseString		=	 $this->bFuncObj->baseString();
								$downobj      	=    $this->downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL);
								//echo $downobj['result']['script'];

								$origfile   	=    $downobj['result']['name'];
				            	$finalFileWExt  = 	 $this->constructFilename($origfile,$downobj['result']['sys_id']);
			            		
			            		if(trim($finalFileWExt) != "_.js"){
				            		$finalFFileName = 	$phpInit->$storedFolderName."/".$finalFileWExt;
		            				$newFlag		=	$restAPI->fileNewCreate($finalFFileName,$downobj['result']['script']);
		            				if($newFlag	==	1){
				            		 
				            		   $this->updateConfigurationXML($phpInit->xmlFile,$finalFFileName,$storedFolderName,$finalFileWExt,$indivSysID,$downobj['result']['sys_created_on'],$downobj['result']['sys_updated_on']);
				            		}
				            		$finalOutput 	=	$this->applyValidation($finalFFileName,$rulepath,$validatecheck);
				            		$finalOutput1    =   $this->applySpecialValidation($finalFFileName,$rulepath,$snowArr[$indivFile],$indivSysID,$indivFile);									    
							    
								}
								else{
									$finalOutput 	=	'Record does not exist or ACL restricts the record retrieval';
								}
							
							}
						

	    				}
	    				else{
	    					$finalOutput = 'Script Type is not valid';
	    				}
	    			}
	    			else{
	    				$finalOutput 			=	"Not a Valid File";
	    			}

	    			if(strlen($finalOutput1)>1)
	    				if($finalOutput != " ")
	    					$finalOutput = $finalOutput.",".$finalOutput1;
	    				else
	    					$finalOutput = $finalOutput1;

	    			if($finalOutput != " ")
	    				$finalJSON[$indivSysID] = $finalOutput;


	    		}		    		
	    	}
	    	
	    	echo json_encode($finalJSON)."\n"; 
	    	ob_flush();
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	    

	}

	/*
	*	Function :	checkSysID
	* 	params 	 :	SysID : hexadecimal number
	*   output   :  Returns 1 if the sysid is the hexadecimal number
	*	
	*/
	public function checkSysID($sysID){
		
		try{

			$sysFlag 		= 	0;
			if(preg_match('/^[0-9A-Fa-f]{32}/', $sysID) && strlen($sysID) == 32)
				$sysFlag 	=	1;
			return $sysFlag;

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	checkFileName
	* 	params 	 :	SysID : hexadecimal number
	*	
	*/

	public function checkFileName($fileName,$snowArr){
		
		try{

			$fileFlag 		= 	0;

			foreach($snowArr as $key=>$value){
				if($key === $fileName){
					$fileFlag = 1;
					break;
				}
			}

			return $fileFlag;

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	checkFileName
	* 	params 	 :	SysID : hexadecimal number
	*	
	*/

	public function constructFilename($fileName,$sys_id){
		
		try{

			$origfile   	 =    $fileName;
		    $origfilename 	 = 	  $origfile;
		    if(strlen($origfile)>15)
		        $origfilename = substr($origfile,0,14);

		    $origfilename 	= 	str_replace(' ', '_', $origfilename);
		    $finalFileWExt  = 	$origfilename."_".$sys_id.".js";

			return $finalFileWExt;

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	applyValidation
	* 	params 	 :	fileName : String
	*	
	*/
	public function applyValidation($fileName,$ruleFolder,$validatecheck){

		try{
				$fullName = $fileName;

				if(file_exists($fullName)){
					if($validatecheck == 1)
						$ret = exec('eslint --rulesdir '.$ruleFolder.' '.$fullName.' 2>&1',$out,$err);
					else
						$ret = exec('eslint '.$fullName.' 2>&1',$out,$err);
				

					$errorCount = count($out);
					$output = array();

					if($errorCount>1){
						$t = 0;
						for($errCount=2;$errCount<$errorCount-3;$errCount++){
							$output[$t]    =    "Line ".trim($out[$errCount]);
							$t++;
						}
						$finalout = implode(",",$output);
					}
					else
						$finalout = " ";	
					
				}
				else{
					$finalout 	=	"Script does not exist";
				}
			    return $finalout;
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	applySpecialValidation
	* 	params 	 :	fileName : String
	*	
	*/
	public function applySpecialValidation($fileName,$ruleFolder,$scriptType,$sysID,$indivFile){

		try{
				$fullName = $fileName;

				$phpTree    =   new CLint;
				$objDOM1  	=   new DOMDocument();
				$objDOM1->load($phpTree->directoryName."/configcond.xml");
				$xml 		= 	simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);

			    $insertfilesCounter =   count($xml->$indivFile->files);
			    $fileScriptFile 	= 	"";
			    $finalout 			= 	"";			    

			    for($insertkey=0; $insertkey< $insertfilesCounter; $insertkey++){

			    		$condition = $xml->$indivFile->files[$insertkey]->condition;

			    		$finalURL 		=	$scriptType."?sysparm_query=sys_id=".$sysID."^".urlencode($condition)."&sysparm_fields=sys_id";

						$serverURL 		=	 $this->bFuncObj->ServiceUrl($finalURL);
						$baseString		=	 $this->bFuncObj->baseString();
						$downobj      	=    $this->downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL);
						$str = "";
						//echo $downobj['result'][0]['sys_id']."\n";					
						if($downobj['result'][0]['sys_id'] != ""){
							
							if(substr(PHP_OS,0,3) == "WIN")
								$ret = exec("eslint --no-eslintrc --rulesdir ".substr($ruleFolder,0,strlen($ruleFolder)-1). " --rule \"".$xml->$indivFile->files[$insertkey]->rulename.":2\" ".$fullName." 2>&1",$out,$err);
							else
								$ret = exec("eslint --no-eslintrc --rulesdir ".substr($ruleFolder,0,strlen($ruleFolder)-1). " --rule '".$xml->$indivFile->files[$insertkey]->rulename.":2' ".$fullName." 2>&1",$out,$err);
								
							//$ret = exec("eslint --no-eslintrc --rulesdir ".substr($ruleFolder,0,strlen($ruleFolder)-1). " --rule '".$xml->$indivFile->files[$insertkey]->rulename.":2' ".$fullName." 2>&1",$out,$err);
				
								$errorCount = count($out);
								$output = array();

								if($errorCount>1){
									$t = 0;
									for($errCount=2;$errCount<$errorCount-3;$errCount++){
											if((trim($out[$errCount]) != "") && (strpos($out[$errCount], ".js") <= 0) && (strpos($out[$errCount], "warnings") <= 0)){
												$output[$t]    =    "Line ".trim($out[$errCount]);
												$t++;
											}
										
									}
									$finalout = implode(",",$output);	
								}
								else
									$finalout = " ";

								unset($str);
						}	
						
			   }
			   unset($xmlFile);
			   unset($objDOM1);
			   unset($xml);
			   unset($insertkey);
			   unset($insertfilesCounter);
			   //unset($finalout);

			   return $finalout;

		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
	}

}

//Calling the function
$phpTree    		=   new CLint;
$acr  =  new SLINT($argv);
$acr->validateFile($phpTree->ruleAvailable);



?></file_content><file_name>codereview.php</file_name><path>acr</path><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareeshhere</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-05 16:19:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4f82c040db42f20043abfd441d9619e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources_4f82c040db42f20043abfd441d9619e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-17 10:38:43</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_acr_sources></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_client_scripts</applied_to><definition><![CDATA["use strict";
 
 
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Helpers
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
/**
* Checks if the given name is a prohibited identifier.
* @param {string} name The name to check
* @returns {boolean} Whether or not the name is prohibited.
*/
function isProhibitedMember(name) {
    return /^(console)$/.test(name);
}

/**
* Checks if the given name is a prohibited identifier.
* @param {string} name The name to check
* @returns {boolean} Whether or not the name is prohibited.
*/
function isProhibitedIdentifier(name) {
    return /^(log|assert|count|debug|dir|dirxml|error|group|groupCollapsed|groupEnd|info|profile|profileEnd|table|time|timeEnd|timeStamp|trace|warn)$/.test(name);
}
 
/**
* Reports the given node and identifier name.
* @param {RuleContext} context The ESLint rule context.
* @param {ASTNode} node The node to report on.
* @param {string} identifierName The name of the identifier.
* @returns {void}
*/
function report(context, node, identifierName) {
    context.report(node, "Console Log Found : {{name}}.", { name: identifierName });
}
 
/**
* Finds the escope reference in the given scope.
* @param {Object} scope The scope to search.
* @param {ASTNode} node The identifier node.
* @returns {Reference|null} Returns the found reference or null if none were found.
*/
function findReference(scope, node) {
    const references = scope.references.filter(reference => reference.identifier.range[0] === node.range[0] &&
            reference.identifier.range[1] === node.range[1]);
 
    if (references.length === 1) {
        return references[0];
    }
    return null;
}
 
/**
* Checks if the given identifier node is shadowed in the given scope.
* @param {Object} scope The current scope.
* @param {Object} globalScope The global scope.
* @param {string} node The identifier node to check
* @returns {boolean} Whether or not the name is shadowed.
*/
function isShadowed(scope, globalScope, node) {
    const reference = findReference(scope, node);
 
    return reference && reference.resolved && reference.resolved.defs.length > 0;
}
 
/**
* Checks if the given identifier node is a ThisExpression in the global scope or the global window property.
* @param {Object} scope The current scope.
* @param {Object} globalScope The global scope.
* @param {string} node The identifier node to check
* @returns {boolean} Whether or not the node is a reference to the global object.
*/
function isGlobalThisReferenceOrGlobalWindow(scope, globalScope, node) {
    if (scope.type === "global" && node.type === "ThisExpression") {
        return true;
    } else if (node.name === "window") {
        return !isShadowed(scope, globalScope, node);
    }
 
    return false;
}
 
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
module.exports = function(context){
  /*  meta: {
        docs: {
            description: "disallow the use of `Log`, `Info`",
            category: "Best Practices",
            recommended: false
        },
 
        schema: []
    },
 
    create(context) {
	*/
        let globalScope;
 
        return {
 
            Program() {
                globalScope = context.getScope();
            },
 
            CallExpression(node) {
                const callee = node.callee,
                    currentScope = context.getScope();
                const property = node.property;    
 
                if (callee && callee.type && callee.object && callee.object.name && callee.type === "MemberExpression") {
                    const identifierName = callee.object.name;
                    
                    if(callee.property && callee.property.type && callee.property.type === "Identifier"){
                        const propertyName = callee.property.name;

                        if (isProhibitedMember(callee.object.name)&& isProhibitedIdentifier(callee.property.name)) {
                                report(context, node, identifierName+'.'+propertyName);
                        }
                    }
                    
 
                } 
 
            }
        };
 
  //  }
};]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Warning</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0007</number><rule_description>Validate the console.log statement</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_CONSOLE_LOG</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-01 11:03:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>848a2e2c6f11be4067a8c8c17c3ee492</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0007</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_848a2e2c6f11be4067a8c8c17c3ee492</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 13:22:54</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_3bd729f44fedf2004172fc728110c737
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_client_scripts,sys_client_script</applied_to><definition><![CDATA[//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context) {
	//     meta: {
		//         docs: {
			//             description: "disallow the use of empty blocks definations",
			//             category: "Block",
			//             recommended: true
			//         },
			
			//         schema: [
			//             {
				//                 type: "object",
				//                 properties: {
					//                     typeof: {
						//                         type: "boolean"
						//                     }
						//                 },
						//                 additionalProperties: false
						//             }
						//         ]
						//     },
						
						//     create(context) {
							//         const options = context.options[0];
							//         var funcInfoStack = [];
							//         const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;
							
							
							return {
								"CallExpression:exit" (node) {
									
									if (node.callee && node.callee.name && node.callee.name == "gel") {
										context.report(node, 'Do not use gel in client side code');
									}
									if (node.callee && node.callee.name && node.callee.name == "jQuery") {
										context.report(node, 'Do not use gel in client side code');
									}
									if (node.callee && node.callee.object && node.callee.object.name && node.callee.object.name === "document") {
										context.report(node, "Dont use document object for DOM manipulation");
									}
									if (node.callee && node.callee.name && node.callee.name === '$j') {
										context.report(node, 'Do not use $j object for DOM manipulation');
									}
								}
							}
							
							//  }
						};
						]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0001</number><rule_description>Client-side code should not use DOM manipulation technique (e.g., jQuery, Prototype JS, gel, document)</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_DOM_MANIPULATION</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-14 11:08:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3bd729f44fedf2004172fc728110c737</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0001</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_3bd729f44fedf2004172fc728110c737</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 13:37:22</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: ecc_agent_script_include_58fc73ffdb31f20043abfd441d961945
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="ecc_agent_script_include"><ecc_agent_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>utility file sender from instance to mid server. </description><name>ScriptSender</name><script><![CDATA[var ScriptSender = Class.create();

ScriptSender.prototype = {
	initialize : function() {
		this.debug = false;
		
		//If you would like to move processed files to a target location, set the next two parameters.
		//Make sure your file name ends up being unique. We will not overwrite a file by the same name
		//in the target directory...
		this.moveProcessedFiles = true;
		this.MIDSERVER_PROCESSED_FILE_PATH = "processed/";
		
		this.resLog = "FTP Log: n";
		this.log("InitializingtaRetriever");
		this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH = probe.getParameter('path')+'/';
		this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME = probe.getParameter('targetFileName');
		
		this.Encoded_Data = probe.getParameter('encodedData');
		
		this.useProxy = this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.use_proxy");
		if (this.useProxy){
			this.proxyHost =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.host");
			this.proxyPort =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.port");
			this.proxyUser =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.username");
			this.proxyPass =this.getConfigParameter("mid.proxy.password");
		}
		this.user = this.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.username");
		this.password = this.getConfigParameter("mid.instance.password");
		
		var ftpCredArr = this.decryptCredentials(probe.getParameter('ftpCred'));
		this.ftpUser = ftpCredArr[0];
		this.ftpPass = ftpCredArr[1];
		this.log('ftprname : '+ftpCredArr[0]);
		this.log('ftpsword : '+ftpCredArr[1]);
		this.ftpTargetServer = probe.getParameter('ftpTargetServer');
		this.ftpPort = (this.isANumber(probe.getParameter('ftpPort'))) ? (probe.getParameter('ftpPort')) : null;
		
		this.targetPath = probe.getParameter('targetPath');
		this.targetFileName = probe.getParameter('targetFileName');
		
		this.host = probe.getParameter('host');
		
		this.transportMethod = probe.getParameter('transportMethod');
		
		
	},
	
	getConfigParameter: function(parm){
		var m= Packages.com.service_now.mid.MIDServer.get();
		var config = m.getConfig();
		var res = config.getParameter(parm);
		var res2 = config.getProperty(parm);
		if (res){
			return res;
		}
		else if (res2){
			return res2;
		}
		else{
			config = Packages.com.service_now.mid.services.Config.get();
			return config.getProperty(parm);
		}
		
	},
	
	decryptCredentials: function(data) {
		var cred = new String(data);
		var e = new Packages.com.glide.util.Encrypter();
		
		var jsCred = cred + '';
		var usernamePass = e.decrypt(jsCred);
		var credArr = usernamePass.split(":", 2);
		return credArr;
	},
	
	saveToFile: function(data, targetPath) {
		var tmpLoc;
		var out;
		try{
			if (this.transportMethod == "MID Server"){
				tmpLoc = targetPath;
			}
			else{
				tmpLoc = this.MIDSERVER_FILE_PATH + this.MIDSERVER_FILE_NAME;
			}
			out = new Packages.java.io.PrintWriter(new Packages.java.io.FileWriter(tmpLoc));
			var e = new Packages.com.glide.util.Encrypter();
			
			// 		  var x = new Packages.java.io.
			
			//       out.print(new GlideStringUtil().base64DecodeAsBytes(data));
			//		  ms.log(new GlideStringUtil().base64DecodeAsBytes(data));
			
			out.print( data);
			
			// 		  ms.log(' testlog '+new Packages.com.glide.util.StringUtil().base64DecodeAsBytes(data));
			
			this.log("File saved to: " + tmpLoc);
		}
		catch(ex){
			ms.log("Exception caught in SNDataRetriever->saveToFile: " + ex.message);
		}
		if(out){
			// out.flush();
			out.close();			
		}
	},
	
	execute: function() {
		var result = '';
		
		var pushRes = true;
		var filR = new Packages.java.io.File('acr');
		filR.mkdirs();
		var saveRes = this.saveToFile(this.Encoded_Data, this.targetPath+ this.targetFileName);
		if(saveRes == true){
			pushRes = this.copyToFTP();
			result = "Sucess";
			//Move tmp file to a processed directory
			if (saveRes && pushRes && this.moveProcessedFiles){
				this.moveProcessedFile();
			}
		}
		else{
			result = "Failed";
			this.log("Thert was empty?");
		}
		return result;
	},
	
	type : "ScriptSender"
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>ecc_agent_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareeshhere</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-05 15:54:53</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>58fc73ffdb31f20043abfd441d961945</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ScriptSender</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ecc_agent_script_include_58fc73ffdb31f20043abfd441d961945</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hareeshhere</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-12 10:20:06</sys_updated_on></ecc_agent_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="mode" table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><active>true</active><array>false</array><array_denormalized>false</array_denormalized><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

sys_update_xml.name: x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_699bbae06f51be4067a8c8c17c3ee421
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_server_scripts</applied_to><definition><![CDATA["use strict";


//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Helpers
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/**
 * Checks if the given name is a prohibited identifier.
 * @param {string} name The name to check
 * @returns {boolean} Whether or not the name is prohibited.
 */
function isProhibitedMember(name) {
	return /^(gs)$/.test(name);
}

/**
 * Checks if the given name is a prohibited identifier.
 * @param {string} name The name to check
 * @returns {boolean} Whether or not the name is prohibited.
 */
function isProhibitedIdentifier(name) {
	return /^(log|info|warn|debug|error)$/.test(name);
}

/**
 * Reports the given node and identifier name.
 * @param {RuleContext} context The ESLint rule context.
 * @param {ASTNode} node The node to report on.
 * @param {string} identifierName The name of the identifier.
 * @returns {void}
 */
function report(context, node, identifierName) {
	context.report(node, "Service Now Log : {{name}} should not be used", { name: identifierName });
}

/**
 * Finds the escope reference in the given scope.
 * @param {Object} scope The scope to search.
 * @param {ASTNode} node The identifier node.
 * @returns {Reference|null} Returns the found reference or null if none were found.
 */
function findReference(scope, node) {
	const references = scope.references.filter(reference => reference.identifier.range[0] === node.range[0] &&
	reference.identifier.range[1] === node.range[1]);
	
	if (references.length === 1) {
		return references[0];
	}
	return null;
}

/**
 * Checks if the given identifier node is shadowed in the given scope.
 * @param {Object} scope The current scope.
 * @param {Object} globalScope The global scope.
 * @param {string} node The identifier node to check
 * @returns {boolean} Whether or not the name is shadowed.
 */
function isShadowed(scope, globalScope, node) {
	const reference = findReference(scope, node);
	
	return reference && reference.resolved && reference.resolved.defs.length > 0;
}

/**
 * Checks if the given identifier node is a ThisExpression in the global scope or the global window property.
 * @param {Object} scope The current scope.
 * @param {Object} globalScope The global scope.
 * @param {string} node The identifier node to check
 * @returns {boolean} Whether or not the node is a reference to the global object.
 */
function isGlobalThisReferenceOrGlobalWindow(scope, globalScope, node) {
	if (scope.type === "global" && node.type === "ThisExpression") {
		return true;
	} else if (node.name === "window") {
		return !isShadowed(scope, globalScope, node);
	}
	
	return false;
}

//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
	/* meta: {
		docs: {
			description: "disallow the use of `Log`, `Info`",
			category: "Best Practices",
			recommended: false
		},
		
		schema: []
	},
	
	create(context) {
 		*/
		let globalScope;
		
		return {
			
			Program() {
				globalScope = context.getScope();
			},
			
			CallExpression(node) {
				if(node && node.callee){
					const callee = node.callee,
					currentScope = context.getScope();
					const property = node.property;
					
					// without window.
					if (callee && callee.type && callee.object && callee.object.name && callee.type && callee.type === "MemberExpression") {
						
						const identifierName = callee.object.name;
						
						if(callee.property && callee.property.type && callee.property.name && callee.property.type === "Identifier"){
							const propertyName = callee.property.name;
							
							if (isProhibitedMember(callee.object.name)&& isProhibitedIdentifier(callee.property.name)) {
								report(context, node, identifierName+'.'+propertyName);
							}
						}
						
						
					}
					
				}
			}
		};
		
		// }
	};]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Warning</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0005</number><rule_description>Validate the log</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_GS_LOG_METHODS</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>shyam.j</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-01 12:18:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>699bbae06f51be4067a8c8c17c3ee421</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0005</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_699bbae06f51be4067a8c8c17c3ee421</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 13:30:48</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="ua_table_licensing_config"><ua_table_licensing_config action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><is_fulfillment>false</is_fulfillment><license_condition/><license_model/><license_roles/><name>x_snc_rcr_review_request</name><op_delete>false</op_delete><op_insert>false</op_insert><op_update>false</op_update><owner_condition/><sys_class_name>ua_table_licensing_config</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareesh.neelisetti</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-07 08:50:09</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a2acfffa6f9a3200f928c8c17c3ee482</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_snc_rcr_review_request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ua_table_licensing_config_a2acfffa6f9a3200f928c8c17c3ee482</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>hareesh.neelisetti</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-07 08:50:09</sys_updated_on></ua_table_licensing_config></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_0ed5a9b5db82760043abfd441d961966
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_server_scripts,sys_script</applied_to><definition><![CDATA[/**
 * @fileoverview Rule to flag references to undeclared variables.
 * @author Karunakar Medamoni
 */
"use strict";

//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Helpers
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------


/**
    @find getRowCount is used on 
**/

function findRowCount(reference) {

    if (reference.identifier && reference.identifier.parent && reference.identifier.parent.property && reference.identifier.parent.property.name === "getRowCount" && reference.identifier.parent.type == "MemberExpression") {
        return reference.identifier.name;
	}
}

function findGlideRecord(gr, reference) {

    if (reference.identifier && reference.identifier.name === gr && reference.identifier.parent && reference.identifier.parent.init != undefined && reference.identifier.parent.init.type === "NewExpression" && reference.identifier.parent.init.callee != undefined && reference.identifier.parent.init.callee.name === "GlideRecord") {
        return true;

    } else {

        return false;

	}
}


function hasNextUsed(gr, reference) {

    if (reference.identifier && reference.identifier.name === gr && reference.identifier.parent != undefined && reference.identifier.parent.property != undefined && reference.identifier.parent.property.name === "next" && reference.identifier.parent.type == "MemberExpression") {
        return true;
    } else {
        return false;
	}
}


//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
   /* meta: {
        docs: {
            description: "disallow",
            category: "Variables",
            recommended: true
        },

        schema: [
            {
                type: "object",
                properties: {
                    typeof: {
                        type: "boolean"
                    }
                },
                additionalProperties: false
            }
        ]
    },

    create(context) {
        const options = context.options[0];
        var funcInfoStack = [];
        const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;

*/
        return {

            "BlockStatement:exit" (node) {
                const globalScope = context.getScope();

                var glideRef = [];
                var glideRefList = [];

                globalScope.references.forEach(ref => {

                    var result = findRowCount(ref);
                    if (result)
                        glideRef.push(result);

                });


                glideRef.forEach(gRef => {

                    var rowCount = 0;
                    var nextCount = 0;
                    globalScope.references.forEach(ref => {

                        if (findGlideRecord(gRef, ref)) {
                            rowCount++;
                        }

                        if (hasNextUsed(gRef, ref)) {
                            nextCount++;
                        }

                    });

                    var obj = {};
                    obj.name = gRef;
                    obj.rowCount = rowCount;
                    obj.nextCount = nextCount;

                    glideRefList.push(obj);

                });

                glideRefList.forEach(name => {

                    if (name.rowCount == 0)
                        context.report({
                            node: node,
                            message: name.name + " is not a GlideRecord reference.",
                            data: node
                        });


                    if (name.rowCount >= 0 && name.nextCount == 0)
                        context.report({
                            node: node,
                            message: name.name + " ; In place of getRowcount use glide aggregate to get result count",
                            data: node
                        });

                });



            }
        };
   // }
};
]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0004</number><rule_description>Replace GlideRecord.getRowCount() with the GlideAggregate if the GlideRecord is not used for iteration.</rule_description><rule_name>REPLACE_getRowCount_WITH_GlideAggregate</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-11 10:03:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>0ed5a9b5db82760043abfd441d961966</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0004</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_0ed5a9b5db82760043abfd441d961966</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-18 09:51:33</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_acr_sources"><x_snc_rcr_acr_sources action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><environment>windows</environment><file_content>
<?php

error_reporting(0);
//Dependent Files
include_once('acr/rest_call.php');
include_once('acr/basic_functions.php');
include_once('acr/include.php');

Class ESlintRules{

	protected $eslintFile;
	protected $bFuncObj;
	protected $table_name = "x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules";
	protected $table_name1 = "x_snc_rcr_code_review_rule_conditions";
	protected $fetchquery = "?sysparm_query=ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,rule_name,applied_to,definition,number";
	protected $lastquery  = "?sysparm_query=active=true^ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on&sysparm_limit=1";	
	
	public function __construct(){

		$this->eslintFile = ".eslintrc.json";
	}

	public function readESlint($fileName){
	  $content 	  =   file_get_contents($fileName);
	  $contentArr =   json_decode($content,true); 
	  return $contentArr; 
	}

	public function createRules(){

		try{
			$this->bFuncObj		=	new BasicFunction;
			$restAPI    		=   new REST_API;
			$phpTree    		=   new CLint;

			$lastsyncedID 		=   $this->lastSyncedEslint();
			
			$serverURL 		=	 $this->bFuncObj->ServiceUrl($this->table_name.$this->fetchquery);
			$baseString		=	 $this->bFuncObj->baseString();
			$downobj      	=    $this->downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL);

			$foldercount    =    $phpTree->folderCount;
			$folderArr		=	array();
			$changedhappened = 0;
			for($cnt = 0; $cnt < $foldercount; $cnt++){
				$folderkey = "folder".$cnt;
				$folderArr[$cnt] = $phpTree->$folderkey;
			}

			for($i = 0; $i<count($downobj["result"]);$i++){

				if($downobj["result"][$i]["sys_id"] == $lastsyncedID)
					break;
				else
					{ 
							$eslintFFilePath  =  $phpTree->eslintLoc.$downobj['result'][$i]['rule_name']."-".$downobj['result'][$i]['number'].".js";
							$newFlag		=	$restAPI->fileJSCreate($eslintFFilePath,$downobj['result'][$i]['definition']);
							//file_put_contents($eslintFFilePath,$downobj['result'][$i]['u_definition']);
							$applied   = explode(",",$downobj["result"][$i]["applied_to"]);
							for($j=0;$j<count($applied);$j++){
								$this->bFuncObj->applyEslintRules($folderArr,$applied[$j],$downobj['result'][$i]['rule_name']);
								$changedhappened = 1;
							}
							//$downobj["result"][$i]["sys_id"];

				    }
			}
			ob_flush();

			if($changedhappened == 1)
				$this->EslintFile();

			/*if($i > 0)
				echo "Rules Created Successfully\n";
		    else
		    	 echo "No Rules Found\n";*/

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			//echo $ex->getMessage();
		}


		

	}

	public function lastSyncedEslint(){
		$phpTree    =   new CLint;
		$xmlFile    =  $phpTree->eslintXML;	
		$objDOM1  	=  new DOMDocument();
		$objDOM1->load($xmlFile);
		$xml 		= 	simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);
		$eslintSysID = $xml->files->file;
		unset($phpTree);
		unset($xmlFile);
		unset($objDOM1);
		unset($xml);
		return $eslintSysID;
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	downloadJSON
	*	params   :  $baseString : authentication, $serverURL : url
	*   output   :  Returns the payload 
	*/
	public function downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL){

		try{

			$restAPI    		=   new REST_API;
			$sys_ver_response   =    $restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverURL);
			$downobj      	    =    json_decode($sys_ver_response,true);
			return $downobj;

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			//echo $ex->getMessage();
		}
		
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	deltaFile
	*	params   :  Null
	*   output   :  Update the delta XML with the last updated SysID 
	*/
	public function EslintFile(){
		
		try{

			$phpTree    =   new CLint;
			$updateVersion 		= 	$this->table_name.$this->lastquery;
			$deltaFile  		=   $phpTree->eslintXML;
			$serverURL    		=   $this->bFuncObj->ServiceUrl($updateVersion);
			$baseString			=	$this->bFuncObj->baseString();
			$obj          		=   $this->downloadJSON($baseString,$serverURL); 
			$topmostSysID 		= 	$obj["result"][0]['sys_id'];
			
			$objDOM1    =   new DOMDocument();
      		$objDOM1->load($deltaFile);
      		$xml = simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);
      		
      		if($xml->files->file != $topmostSysID){
        		$xml->files->file = $topmostSysID;
        		$xml->files->sys_created_on = $obj["result"][0]['sys_created_on'];
        		$xml->files->sys_updated_on = $obj["result"][0]['sys_updated_on'];
        		$xml->files->created = $obj["result"][0]['sys_created_on'];
        		$xml->files->updated = $obj["result"][0]['sys_updated_on'];
        		$xml->asXML($deltaFile);
        	}	

			unset($phpTree);
			unset($bFunc);
			unset($restAPI);
			unset($updateVersion);
			unset($deltaFile);
			unset($obj);
			unset($deltaValue);

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			//echo $ex->getMessage();
		}	
	}

	/*
	*	Function :	deltaFile
	*	params   :  Null
	*   output   :  Update the delta XML with the last updated SysID 
	*/
	public function removeRules(){
		
		try{

			$phpTree    =   new CLint;
			$restAPI    =   new REST_API;
			$bFunc		=	new BasicFunction;
			$instance 	= 	$phpTree->surfInstance;
			$apiScript 	= 	'api/now/table';
			$baseString			=	$bFunc->baseString();
			//echo $phpTree->eslintLoc;
			if(file_exists($phpTree->eslintLoc)){

				if(substr(PHP_OS,0,3) == "WIN")
						exec('rmdir /S/Q '.$phpTree->eslintLoc);
				else
						exec('rm -rf '.$phpTree->eslintLoc);

				mkdir($phpTree->eslintLoc,0777);

				$foldercount    =    $phpTree->folderCount;

				$folderArr		=	 array();
				$globals  	    =    array();

				$changedhappened = 0;

				for($cnt = 0; $cnt < $foldercount; $cnt++){
					$folderkey  =  "folder".$cnt;
					$folderArr[$cnt] = $phpTree->$folderkey;
					$filename   =  $phpTree->$folderkey."/".$this->eslintFile;
              		$strContent =  file_get_contents($filename);
              		$contentArr =  json_decode($strContent,true);
              		$globals =  $contentArr['globals'];
              		unlink($filename);
              		$elsintFArr = 'acr/beslintrc.json'; 
              		$strContent =  file_get_contents($elsintFArr);
              		$contentArr =  json_decode($strContent,true);
              		if(count($globals)>0)
              			unset($contentArr['globals']);
              		$contentArr['globals'] = $globals;
              		$restAPI->fileCreate($filename,json_encode($contentArr));
				}

				if($globals != "," || $globals != " ")
					$bFunc->applyGlobalRulesinEslint($folderArr,$globals,$this->eslintFile);

				$bFunc->EsLintRules($this->table_name,$instance,$apiScript,$baseString,$phpTree->eslintLoc,$folderArr,$globals);
				
				$this->confiureCondition($folderArr);
			}

		}catch(Exception $ex){
			//echo $ex->getMessage();
		}	
	}

	public function confiureCondition($folderArr){

		try{

			$phpTree    =   new CLint;
			$restAPI    =   new REST_API;
			$bFunc		=	new BasicFunction;
			$instance 	= 	$phpTree->surfInstance;
			$apiScript 	= 	'api/now/table';
			$baseString			=	$bFunc->baseString();
			$bFunc->configureRules($this->table_name1,$instance,$apiScript,$baseString,$phpTree->eslintLoc,$folderArr);
			
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){

		}

	}

}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_scripts</applied_to><definition><![CDATA["use strict";
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
	//     meta: {
		//         docs: {
			//             description: "disallow the use of empty blocks definations",
			//             category: "Block",
			//             recommended: true
			//         },
			
			//         schema: [{
				//             type: "object",

					//                 typeof: {
						//                     type: "boolean"
						//                 }
						//             },
						//             additionalProperties: false
						//         }]
						//     },
						
						//     create(context) {
							//         const options = context.options[0];
							//         var funcInfoStack = [];
							// const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;
							
							
							return {
								Program(node) {
									/* Check if VariableDeclaration is done on global scope */
									
									if(node && node.body ){
										
										node.body.forEach(function(element) {
											if (element.type === "VariableDeclaration") {
												context.report(element, "Do not declare variables in global scope");
											}
										})
									}
								}
								
							}
							
							// }
						};
						]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Warning</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0015</number><rule_description>Do not declare variables in global scope</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_POLLUTING_GLOBAL_SCOPE</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rahulraviprasad</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-11 09:06:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ff985531db82760043abfd441d961910</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0015</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_ff985531db82760043abfd441d961910</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 12:35:17</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>
