sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_acr_sources"><x_snc_rcr_acr_sources action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><environment>windows</environment><file_content><?php
/********************

Package : Basic Functions

********************/

class BasicFunction
{

	protected $foldername	=	"";
    protected $content 		=	"";
    protected $componentArr =	array();

    /*
    * Function Name : directoryCreate
    * Params 		: Directory Name : String
    * Description   : To create parent directory
    * Output 		: Null
    */

	public function directoryCreate($directory){

		try{
				if(!file_exists($directory))
					{
						mkdir($directory,0777);
						chmod($directory,0777);
					}
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
           echo 'Caught Exception: '.$ex->getMessage();
		}
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : configurationSetting
    * Params 		: Directory Name : String
    * Description   : To create parent directory
    * Output 		: String : configuration
    */
	public function configurationSetting($directory,$instancename,$username,$password,$directorylist,$ruleAvailable){

		try{
				$directoryListLength = count($directorylist);
				$this->content = '<?php'.PHP_EOL;
    			$this->content .= 'class CLint{'.PHP_EOL;
    			$this->content .= "public \$directoryName='".$directory."';".PHP_EOL; 
			    $this->content .= "public \$surfInstance='".$instancename."';".PHP_EOL; 
			    $this->content .= "public \$username='".$username."';".PHP_EOL; 
			    $this->content .= "public \$password='".base64_encode($password)."';".PHP_EOL;
			    $this->content .= "public \$xmlFile='".$directory."/configuration.xml';".PHP_EOL;
			    $this->content .= "public \$folderCount='".$directoryListLength."';".PHP_EOL;
			    $this->content .= "public \$updateVersion = 'sys_update_version?sysparm_query=ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on,name&sysparm_limit=1';".PHP_EOL;
			    $this->content .= "public \$topMost = 'sys_update_version?sysparm_query=ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on,name';".PHP_EOL;
			    $this->content .= "public \$deltaFile='".$directory."/delta.xml';".PHP_EOL;

				for($i=0;$i<$directoryListLength;$i++)
		 		{
					$folder =  $directory.'/'.$directorylist[$i];
					if(mkdir($folder,0777))
					{
						$this->foldername = "folder".$i;
	    			    $this->content .= "public \$".$this->foldername."='".$folder."';".PHP_EOL; 
						chmod($folder,0777);
					}
		  		}
				$this->content .= "public \$eslintLoc='".$directory."/rules/';".PHP_EOL;
				$this->content .= "public \$eslintXML='".$directory."/eslint.xml';".PHP_EOL;
				$this->content .= "public \$ruleAvailable=".$ruleAvailable.";".PHP_EOL;
    		    $this->content .= '} ?>'.PHP_EOL ;
    		    return $this->content;
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
           echo 'Caught Exception: '.$ex->getMessage();
		}
	}


    /*
    * Function Name : fileCreate
    * Params 		: File Name : String, Content : String
    * Description   : To create Configuration File
    * Output 		: Null
    */

	public function fileCreate($fileName,$content){

		try{
			$flag = 0;
			$fp  = fopen($fileName,'wb');
    		fwrite($fp,$content);
    		fclose($fp);
    		$flag = 1;
    		return $flag;
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
           echo 'Caught Exception: '.$ex->getMessage();
		}
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : folderArray
    * Params 		: componentName
    * Output 		: Return Array
    */	

	public function folderArray(){

		$componentArray     =   array();
		$tscripttype 		=	$this->typicalScriptType();
		$gscripttype 		=	$this->generalSriptType();
		for($key = 0; $key < count($tscripttype); $key++){
			$componentArray[$tscripttype[$key]] = $gscripttype[$key];
		}

		return $componentArray;
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : folderArray
    * Params 		: componentName
    * Output 		: Return FolderName
    */	

	public function folderArrayIndex($componentName){

		$componentArray    =   $this->folderArray();
		return $componentArray[$componentName];
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : ComponentArray
    * Params 		: folderName
    * Output 		: Return InstanceComponent
    */	

	public function ComponentArray(){

		$folderArray    	=   array();
		$tscripttype 		=	$this->typicalScriptType();
		$gscripttype 		=	$this->generalSriptType();
		for($key = 0; $key < count($tscripttype); $key++){
			$folderArray[$gscripttype[$key]] = $tscripttype[$key];
		}

		return $folderArray;
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : ComponentArray
    * Params 		: folderName
    * Output 		: Return InstanceComponent
    */	

	public function ComponentArrayIndex($folderName){

		$folderArray  		=	$this->ComponentArray();
		return $folderArray[$folderName];
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : ComponentArray
    * Params 		: folderName
    * Output 		: Return InstanceComponent
    */	
	public function folderValue(){

		$phpTree    			=   new CLint;
		$countFolder	 		= 	$phpTree->folderCount;
		$this->componentArr 	=   $this->folderArray();

		$folderFinalArray 		=	array();

		for($key =  0; $key <  $countFolder; $key++){

              $foldername   =   'folder'.$key;
              $folderVal    =    substr(strrchr($phpTree->$foldername, "/"),1);

              foreach($this->componentArr as $ckey=>$value){

               		if($folderVal == $this->componentArr[$ckey]){
              			$folderFinalArray[$ckey] = $foldername; 
              		}	
               }        			
        }

        return $folderFinalArray;
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : ServiceUrl
    * Params 		: Table to be Fetched
    * Output 		: Return ServiceUrl
    */
	public function ServiceUrl($finalstring){

		$phpTree     =   new CLint;
		$instance    =   $phpTree->surfInstance;
		$apiScript   =   'api/now/table';

		return $instance."/".$apiScript."/".$finalstring;
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : ServiceUrl
    * Params 		: Table to be Fetched
    * Output 		: Return ServiceUrl
    */
	public function baseString(){

		$phpTree     =   new CLint;
		$username    =   $phpTree->username;
		$password    =   base64_decode($phpTree->password);
		$baseString  =   base64_encode($username.':'.$password);

		return $baseString;
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : ServiceUrl
    * Params 		: Table to be Fetched
    * Output 		: Return ServiceUrl
    */
	public function checkScriptType($scriptVerify){

		$scriptType = $this->typicalScriptType();

		$returnval = 0;
		foreach($scriptType as $key=>$value){

			if($value == $scriptVerify)
				$returnval = 1;
		}

		return $returnval;
	}

	/*
    * Function Name : ServiceUrl
    * Output 		: Create DeltaFile
    */

	public function deltaFileCreate(){

		$phpTree     =   new CLint;

		$serverUrl   = 	 $this->ServiceUrl($phpTree->topMost);	
		$baseString  =   $this->baseString();

		$restAPI     =   new REST_API;
		$response    =    $restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverUrl);
        $obj         =    json_decode($response,true); 

        $dom                =   new DomDocument("1.0", "UTF-8");
        $xmlfileNameTag     =   $dom->createElement('slint');
        $dom->appendChild($xmlfileNameTag);

        $filesTag     = $dom->createElement('files');
        $xmlfileNameTag->appendChild($filesTag);

        $fileTag      = $dom->createElement('file',$obj['result'][0]['sys_id']);
        $createdTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_created_on',$obj['result'][0]['sys_created_on']);
        $updatedTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_updated_on',$obj['result'][0]['sys_updated_on']);

         $filesTag->appendChild($fileTag);
         $filesTag->appendChild($createdTag);
         $filesTag->appendChild($updatedTag);

         $dom->formatOutput = true;
         $dom->save($phpTree->deltaFile);
         unset($dom);
	}


	public function EslintFileCreate(){

		$phpTree     =   new CLint;

		$lastquery  = "x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules?sysparm_query=ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on&sysparm_limit=1";	

		$serverUrl  = 	 $this->ServiceUrl($lastquery);	
		$baseString  =   $this->baseString();

		$restAPI     =   new REST_API;
		$response    =    $restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverUrl);
        $obj         =    json_decode($response,true); 

        $dom                =   new DomDocument("1.0", "UTF-8");
        $xmlfileNameTag     =   $dom->createElement('slint');
        $dom->appendChild($xmlfileNameTag);

        $filesTag     = $dom->createElement('files');
        $xmlfileNameTag->appendChild($filesTag);

        $fileTag      = $dom->createElement('file',$obj['result'][0]['sys_id']);
        $createdTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_created_on',$obj['result'][0]['sys_created_on']);
        $updatedTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_updated_on',$obj['result'][0]['sys_updated_on']);

         $filesTag->appendChild($fileTag);
         $filesTag->appendChild($createdTag);
         $filesTag->appendChild($updatedTag);

         $dom->formatOutput = true;
         $dom->save($phpTree->eslintXML);
         unset($dom);
	}
	

	public function scriptJSON(){

		$fileArray    =   array(
  		'BusinessRules'  	=>  	'beslintrc.json',
  		'ClientScripts'  	=>  	'ceslintrc.json'
		);

		return $fileArray;

	}

	public function typicalScriptType(){

		//$tScriptName 	=	array();
		$tScriptName = array('sys_script','sys_script_client','sys_script_include','sysevent_script_action','sys_ui_script','catalog_script_client');
		return $tScriptName;
	}

	public function generalSriptType(){
		//$gScriptName 	=	array();
		$gScriptName = array('BusinessRules','ClientScripts','ScriptIncludes','ScriptActions','UIScripts','CatalogClientScripts');
		return $gScriptName;
	}

	public function RuleScript(){

		$ruleArray = array(
			'all_scripts'=>array('BusinessRules','ClientScripts','ScriptIncludes','ScriptActions','UIScripts','CatalogClientScripts'),
			'all_server_scripts'=>array('BusinessRules','ScriptIncludes'),
			'sys_script'=>array('BusinessRules'),
			'sys_script_client'=>array('ClientScripts'),
			'catalog_script_client'=>array('CatalogClientScripts'),
			'sysevent_script_action'=>array('ScriptActions'),
			'sys_script_include'=>array('ScriptIncludes'),
			'sys_ui_script'=>array('UIScripts'),
			'business_rules'=>array('BusinessRules'),
			'all_client_scripts'=>array('ClientScripts','UIScripts','ScriptActions','CatalogClientScripts'),
			'client_scripts'=>array('ClientScripts'),
			'ui_scripts'=>array('UIScripts'), 
			'ui_actions'=>array(), 
			'ui_pages'=>array(), 
			'script_includes'=>array('ScriptIncludes'), 
			'script_actions'=>array('ScriptActions'),
			'transform_map_scripts'=>array(),
			'run_script_activities'=>array()
		);

		return $ruleArray;

	}

	public function readESlint($fileName){
	  $content 	  =   file_get_contents($fileName);
	  $contentArr =   json_decode($content,true); 
	  return $contentArr; 
	}

	//Apply the Rules based upon the applied
	public function applyEslintRules($folderArr,$applied,$rule){
		try{
			$eslintFile 	= 	".eslintrc.json";
			$appliedRule 	=	$this->RuleScript();
			$appliedrulecnt =   count($appliedRule[$applied]);
			for($rulecnt = 0; $rulecnt < $appliedrulecnt; $rulecnt++){

				$foldercount = count($folderArr);

				for($file = 0; $file < $foldercount; $file++){
					$folderVal     =    substr(strrchr($folderArr[$file], "/"),1);
					if($folderVal == $appliedRule[$applied][$rulecnt]){

						$eslintrj  = $folderArr[$file]."/".$eslintFile;
						$contentArr = $this->readESlint($eslintrj);
						$contentArr["rules"][$rule] = "error";
						$jsonContent = json_encode($contentArr);
						file_put_contents($eslintrj,$jsonContent); 
					}					

				}

			}
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->Message();
		}
	 }

	 /* Function : EsLintRules 
    *  Params   : instance : string, apiscript : string, baseString : string, filepath : string, folderArr : Array,
                  globals: Array
    *  Output   : Update the rules in the eslintrc in the script type folder 
	*/
      public function FileXMLCreate($baseString,$serverUrl,$fileName){

	      	try{

	      		$restAPI     =   new REST_API;
				$response    =    $restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverUrl);
		        $obj         =    json_decode($response,true); 

		        $dom                =   new DomDocument("1.0", "UTF-8");
		        $xmlfileNameTag     =   $dom->createElement('slint');
		        $dom->appendChild($xmlfileNameTag);

		        $filesTag     = $dom->createElement('files');
		        $xmlfileNameTag->appendChild($filesTag);

		        $fileTag      = $dom->createElement('file',$obj['result'][0]['sys_id']);
		        $createdTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_created_on',$obj['result'][0]['sys_created_on']);
		        $updatedTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_updated_on',$obj['result'][0]['sys_updated_on']);

		         $filesTag->appendChild($fileTag);
		         $filesTag->appendChild($createdTag);
		         $filesTag->appendChild($updatedTag);

		         $dom->formatOutput = true;
		         $dom->save($fileName);
		         unset($dom);

		         if(file_exists($fileName))
		         	return 1;
		         else
		         	return 0;

	      	}
	      	catch(Exception $ex){
	      		echo $ex->getMessage();
	      	}
		}

		/* Function : applyGlobalRulesinEslint 
    *  Params   : folderArr : Array, globals: Array
    *  Output   : Update the globals in the eslintrc in the script type folder 
	*/
	
	public function applyGlobalRulesinEslint($folderArr,$globals,$eslintFile){
		try{
			
			//Update the globals in all eslintrc
			$foldercount 	= 	count($folderArr);
			for($file = 0; $file < $foldercount; $file++){

				//FileName
				$eslintrj  	= 	$folderArr[$file]."/".$eslintFile;

				//Read the content of the existing eslintrc
				$contentArr = 	$this->readESlint($eslintrj);
				$globArr 	= 	explode(",",$globals);

				//update the global content in eslintrc
				for($k = 0; $k<count($globArr); $k++){
					if($globArr[$k] != ""){
						$contentArr["globals"][$globArr[$k]] = 1;
					}
				}

				//Write the content
				$jsonContent = json_encode($contentArr);
				file_put_contents($eslintrj,$jsonContent); 						
				
			}
			unset($jsonContent);
			unset($globArr);
			unset($contentArr);
			unset($eslintrj);
			unset($foldercount);
		}
		catch(Exception $ex){
			echo $ex->getMessage();
		}	
	}

	/* Function : EsLintRules 
    *  Params   : instance : string, apiscript : string, baseString : string, filepath : string, folderArr : Array,
                  globals: Array
    *  Output   : Update the rules in the eslintrc in the script type folder 
	*/	
                  
	public function EsLintRules($ruleTable,$instance,$apiScript,$baseString,$filepath,$folderArr,$globals){
			try
			{
				$restAPI = new REST_API;
				//Query to download the rules from the table (u_code_review_rules)
				$fetchquery 	=   $ruleTable."?sysparm_query=active=true^mode=eslint^ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,rule_name,applied_to,definition,active,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on,number,mode";
				$serverURL 		=	 $instance."/".$apiScript."/".$fetchquery;
				
				$dom                =   new DomDocument("1.0", "UTF-8");
		        $xmlfileNameTag     =   $dom->createElement('slint');
		        $dom->appendChild($xmlfileNameTag);

		        $filesTag     = $dom->createElement('files');
		        $xmlfileNameTag->appendChild($filesTag);

				//Download the payload
				$fileResponse   =   $restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverURL);
	            $downobj   		= 	json_decode($fileResponse,true);


				for($i = 0; $i<count($downobj["result"]); $i++){	
					
						//Create a Rule in the Rules Folder
					//$eslintFFilePath  =  $filepath.$downobj['result'][$i]['rule_name'].'-'.$downobj['result'][$i]['number'].".js";
					$eslintFFilePath  =  $filepath.'_'.$downobj['result'][$i]['number'].".js";
					$newFlag		  =	 $restAPI->fileJSCreate($eslintFFilePath,$downobj['result'][$i]['definition']);
					
					//Apply the Rule to the eslintrc if the File was created
					if($newFlag){

						

							$filesTag     = $dom->createElement('files');
			        		$xmlfileNameTag->appendChild($filesTag);

			        		$fileTag      = $dom->createElement('file',$downobj['result'][$i]['sys_id']);
							$nameTag      = $dom->createElement('name','_'.$downobj['result'][$i]['number']);
			        		$createdTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_created_on',$downobj['result'][$i]['sys_created_on']);
			        		$updatedTag   = $dom->createElement('sys_updated_on',$downobj['result'][$i]['sys_updated_on']);

			        		$filesTag->appendChild($fileTag);
			        		$filesTag->appendChild($nameTag);
			         		$filesTag->appendChild($createdTag);
			         		$filesTag->appendChild($updatedTag);

			        		if($downobj["result"][$i]["applied_to"] != ""){

								$applied  	  = 	explode(",",$downobj["result"][$i]["applied_to"]);

								for($j=0;$j<count($applied);$j++){
									$this->applyEslintRules($folderArr,$applied[$j],'_'.$downobj['result'][$i]['number']);
								}
							}
						
					}

					

					unset($newFlag);
					unset($eslintFFilePath);
					
				}
				$fileName = substr($filepath,0,strrpos(substr($filepath,0,strlen($filepath)-2),"/"))."/eslint.xml";
				$dom->formatOutput = true;
		        $dom->save($fileName);
		        unset($dom);

				//Clear the variables in the memory
				unset($folderArr);
				unset($applied);
				unset($downobj);
				unset($fileResponse);
				unset($serverURL);
				unset($fetchquery);
		    }
		    catch (Exception $ex){
			 	echo $ex->getMessage;
			}

	}

	public function configureRules($ruleTable,$instance,$apiScript,$baseString,$filepath,$folderArr){

		try{

			$restAPI 		= 	new REST_API;
			$eslintFile 	= 	".eslintrc.json";
			$fetchQuery 	= 	$ruleTable."?sysparm_query=active=true";
			$serverURL 		=	$instance."/".$apiScript."/".$fetchQuery;

			$fileName = substr($filepath,0,strrpos(substr($filepath,0,strlen($filepath)-2),"/"))."/configcond.xml";
			unlink($fileName);

		    $this->createConfigRuleXML($fileName);
		    $appliedRule 	=	$this->RuleScript();

			$fileResponse   =   $restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverURL);
	        $downobj   		= 	json_decode($fileResponse,true);

	        for($response = 0; $response<count($downobj["result"]); $response++){   		

			    $applied_to = $downobj["result"][$response]['applied_to'];
			     //$downobj["result"][$response]['rule']['value']."\n";
			     $name = $this->returnRuleName($filepath,$downobj["result"][$response]['rule']['value']);

			    for($scriptCount = 0; $scriptCount<count($appliedRule[$applied_to]); $scriptCount++){
			    	
			    	if($name != "" ){
			    		$objDOM2  	= 	new DOMDocument();
						$objDOM2->load($fileName);
						$xml      	= 	simplexml_import_dom($objDOM2);

				    	$storedFolderName = $appliedRule[$applied_to][$scriptCount];

				    	$xmlFFolder = $xml->$storedFolderName->addChild("files");
						$xmlFFolder->addChild('applied_to',$downobj["result"][$response]['applied_to']);
						$xmlFFolder->addChild('condition',$downobj["result"][$response]['filter_condition']);
						$xmlFFolder->addChild('rulename',$name);
						$xml->asXML($fileName);	

						$foldercount = count($folderArr);

						for($file = 0; $file < $foldercount; $file++){
							$folderVal     =    substr(strrchr($folderArr[$file], "/"),1);
							if($folderVal == $storedFolderName){

								$eslintrj  = $folderArr[$file]."/".$eslintFile;
								$contentArr = $this->readESlint($eslintrj);
								if($contentArr["rules"][trim($name)] != "")
									$contentArr["rules"][trim($name)] = "off";
								$jsonContent = json_encode($contentArr);
								file_put_contents($eslintrj,$jsonContent); 
							}					

						}
			    	}
			    	
			    }
			    
				

	        }	

		}catch(Exception $ex){

		}
	}

	public function createConfigRuleXML($fileName){

		$dom                =   new DomDocument("1.0", "UTF-8");
		$xmlfileNameTag     =   $dom->createElement('slint');
		$dom->appendChild($xmlfileNameTag);

		$appliedRule 	=	$this->RuleScript();
		for($i = 0; $i < count($appliedRule['all_scripts']); $i++){

			$filesTag     = $dom->createElement($appliedRule['all_scripts'][$i]);
		    $xmlfileNameTag->appendChild($filesTag);
		    
		}

		$dom->formatOutput = true;
		$dom->save($fileName);
		unset($dom);

	}

	public function returnRuleName($filepath,$sysID){

		$fileName   = substr($filepath,0,strrpos(substr($filepath,0,strlen($filepath)-2),"/"))."/eslint.xml";

		$xmlFile    =  $fileName; 	
		$objDOM1  	=  new DOMDocument();
		$objDOM1->load($xmlFile);
		$xml 		= 	simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);

	    $insertfilesCounter =   count($xml->files);
	    $fileScriptFile 	= 	"";
	    
	    for($insertkey=0; $insertkey< $insertfilesCounter; $insertkey++){

				if($xml->files[$insertkey]->file == $sysID){

					$fileScriptFile = $xml->files[$insertkey]->name;
					break;

			}
	   }
	   unset($xmlFile);
	   unset($objDOM1);
	   unset($xml);
	   unset($insertkey);
	   unset($insertfilesCounter);

	   return $fileScriptFile;

	}

}</file_content><file_name>basic_functions.php</file_name><path>acr</path><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareeshhere</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-05 16:17:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>95f14040db42f20043abfd441d9619e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources_95f14040db42f20043abfd441d9619e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-14 04:25:40</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_acr_sources></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_scripts</applied_to><definition><![CDATA[//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
	//     meta: {
		//         docs: {
			//             description: "disallow the use of empty blocks definations",
			//             category: "Block",
			//             recommended: true
			//         },
			
			//         schema: [
			//             {
				//                 type: "object",
				//                 properties: {
					//                     typeof: {
						//                         type: "boolean"
						//                     }
						//                 },
						//                 additionalProperties: false
						//             }
						//         ]
						//     },
						
						//     create(context) {
							//         const options = context.options[0];
							//         var funcInfoStack = [];
							//         const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;
							
							
							return {
								
								"BlockStatement:exit"(node) {
									if(node && node.body && node.body.length  === 0) {
										context.report(node, "Scripts should not have an empty blocks defined ")
									}
								}
							}
							
							// }
						};
						]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0014</number><rule_description>Client Scripts should not have an empty script field</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_EMPTY_SCRIPT</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rahulraviprasad</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-11 08:57:03</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c366d9fddb42760043abfd441d96198f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0014</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_c366d9fddb42760043abfd441d96198f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 12:36:15</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_7b127f1edb61360043abfd441d96196b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_rcr.UpdateRuleDefinition</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>UpdateRuleDefinition</name><script><![CDATA[var UpdateRuleDefinition = Class.create();
UpdateRuleDefinition.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	update: function() {
		var value = this.getParameter('sysparm_definition');
		var recordID = this.getParameter('sysparm_recordID');
		var ruleNumber = this.getParameter('sysparm_ruleNumber');		
		var ruleName = this.getParameter('sysparm_ruleName');
		var ruleDesc = this.getParameter('sysparm_ruleDesc');
		var isOOTB = this.getParameter('sysparm_isOOTB');
		var appliedTo = this.getParameter('sysparm_appliedTo');
		var lintLevel = this.getParameter('sysparm_lintLevel');
		var isActive = this.getParameter('sysparm_active');
		
		var gr = new GlideRecord('x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules');
		gr.get(recordID);
		
		gr.number = ruleNumber;
		gr.definition = value;
		gr.rule_name = ruleName;
		gr.rule_description = ruleDesc;
		gr.is_ootb = isOOTB;
		gr.applied_to = appliedTo;
		gr.active = isActive;
		gr.lint_level = lintLevel;
		
		gr.update();
		
		return true;
		
	},
	
	updateCondition: function() {
		var recordID = this.getParameter('sysparm_recordID');
		var isNewRecord = this.getParameter('sysparm_isNewRecord');
		var ruleID = this.getParameter('sysparm_rule');
		var ruleAppliedTo = this.getParameter('sysparm_ruleAppliedTo');
		var conditionAppliedTo = this.getParameter('sysparm_appliedTo');
		var filterCondition = this.getParameter('sysparm_filterCondition');		
		var valid = false;
		var isActive = this.getParameter('sysparm_active');
		
		gs.info('updateCondition Parameters :' + recordID + ':' + isNewRecord + ':' + ruleID + ':' + ruleAppliedTo + ':' + conditionAppliedTo + ':' + filterCondition + ':' + valid + ':' + isActive);
		
		if(filterCondition && conditionAppliedTo){
			
			var ruleAppliedToArry = ruleAppliedTo.toString().split(",");

			var clientSideComponents = 'sys_script_client,sys_ui_script,catalog_script_client';
			var serverSideComponents = 'sys_script,sys_script_include,sysevent_script_action';

			for (var i=0; i < ruleAppliedToArry.length; i++) {
				if(ruleAppliedToArry[i] == 'all_scripts') {
					valid = true;
					break;
				}else {
					if(ruleAppliedToArry[i] == conditionAppliedTo ||
						((clientSideComponents.indexOf(conditionAppliedTo) > -1 && (clientSideComponents.indexOf(ruleAppliedToArry[i]) > -1 || ruleAppliedToArry[i] == 'all_client_scripts'))
					||
					(serverSideComponents.indexOf(conditionAppliedTo) > -1 && (serverSideComponents.indexOf(ruleAppliedToArry[i]) > -1 || ruleAppliedToArry[i] == 'all_server_scripts'))
					)
					){
						valid = true;
						break;
					}
				}
			}		
		}
		
		return valid;
	},
	
	type: 'UpdateRuleDefinition'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-19 13:03:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7b127f1edb61360043abfd441d96196b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateRuleDefinition</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7b127f1edb61360043abfd441d96196b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-03-29 10:22:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_7b656df4db25b20043abfd441d9619e7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_properties</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sys_properties">nameSTARTSWITHx_snc_rcr.ACRConnectionStatus^EQ<item endquery="false" field="name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="STARTSWITH" or="false" value="x_snc_rcr.ACRConnectionStatus"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SyncAcrStatus</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	var	acrTotalCommandString = '';
	if(current.value == 'Initialized'){

		
		// delete acr folder contents and recreate
		//refurbishACR();
		
		//call to script include x_snc_rcr.SyncACRFiles to sync code files.
		
		var syncFiles = new global.SyncACRFiles();
		syncFiles.copyACRFiles();
		
		
		// call script include to communicate a code referesh
		var queue = new GlideRecord('ecc_queue');
		queue.initialize();
		queue.topic = 'Command';
		queue.queue = 'output';

		acrTotalCommandString += '<parameters> <parameter name="name" value ="php acr/acr.php '+gs.getProperty('x_snc_rcr.ACRUser4Mid')+' '+gs.getProperty('x_snc_rcr.ACRUserPwd4MID')+' '+'https://'+gs.getProperty('instance_name')+'.service-now.com '+ 'BusinessRules,ClientScripts,ScriptIncludes,ScriptActions,UIScripts,CatalogClientScripts"/> </parameters>';
		
		queue.agent = getActiveMidAgentName();
		
		if(queue.agent == '-1'){
			gs.addErrorMessage('No ACtive MID server message');
				return false;
		}
		queue.payload= acrTotalCommandString;
		
		queue.insert();
		
		current.value = 'Processing';
		current.update();	
		
	}
	
	
})(current, previous);

function getActiveMidAgentName(){
	var agent = new GlideRecord('ecc_agent');
	var midserverName ='mid.server.';
	agent.initialize();
	agent.addQuery('status','up');
	agent.addQuery('name',gs.getProperty('x_snc_rcr.ESLintMid'));
	agent.query();
	if(agent.next()){
		midserverName += agent.name;
	}else{
		midserverName = '-1';
	}
	return midserverName;
}

function refurbishACR(){
// 		var queue = new GlideRecord('ecc_queue');
// 		queue.initialize();
// 		queue.topic = 'Command';
// 		queue.queue = 'output';
// 		queue.agent = 	getActiveMidAgentName();
// 		queue.name = 'del /q acr\\';
// 		queue.insert();
		
		var queue2 = new GlideRecord('ecc_queue');
		queue2.initialize();
		queue2.topic = 'Command';
		queue2.queue = 'output';
		queue2.agent = 	getActiveMidAgentName();
		queue2.name = 'mkdir acr';
		queue2.insert();
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-14 11:02:36</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>7b656df4db25b20043abfd441d9619e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SyncAcrStatus</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7b656df4db25b20043abfd441d9619e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-18 05:09:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7b656df4db25b20043abfd441d9619e7"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_acr_sources"><x_snc_rcr_acr_sources action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><environment>windows</environment><file_content><?php
/********************
********************/

class REST_API
{


  public function getRESTAPI($baseString,$service_url)
  {
     $method='GET';
     $curl = curl_init();

  	  curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  	  CURLOPT_URL => $service_url,
	  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
	  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
	  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
	  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
	  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
	  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => $method,
	  CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER=>false,
	  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
      "authorization: Basic ".$baseString,
      "cache-control: no-cache",
       ),
      ));
      $response = curl_exec($curl);
      $err = curl_error($curl);
	
	  curl_close($curl);

	  if ($err) {
        echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
      } else {
       return $response;
     } 
  }

  public function PUTRestAPI($baseString,$service_url,$content){
          $curl = curl_init();

          curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
          CURLOPT_URL => $service_url,
          CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
          CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
          CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
          CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
          CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
          CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
          CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => $content,
		  CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER=>false,
          CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
            "authorization: Basic ".$baseString,
            "cache-control: no-cache",
            "content-type: application/json",
          ),
        ));

        $response = curl_exec($curl);
        $err = curl_error($curl);

        curl_close($curl);

        if ($err) {
          return "cURL Error #:" . $err;
        } else {
          //echo $response;
          return "Successfully Inserted into PROD";
        }
  }

  public function PUTRestFAPI($baseString,$service_url,$content){
          $curl = curl_init();

          curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
          CURLOPT_URL => $service_url,
          CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
          CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
          CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
          CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
          CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
          CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "PUT",
          CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => $content,
		  CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYPEER=>false,
          CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
            "authorization: Basic ".$baseString,
            "cache-control: no-cache",
            "content-type: application/json",
          ),
        ));

        $response = curl_exec($curl);
        $err = curl_error($curl);

        curl_close($curl);

        if ($err) {
          return "cURL Error #:" . $err;
        } else {
          //echo $response;
          return $response;
        }
  }

  public function fileWCreate($filename,$content)
  {
  	//if(file_exists($filename)){
  		$fp  = fopen($filename,'wb');
    	fwrite($fp,$content);
    	fclose($fp); 
      $newFile = 1;
      return $newFile;
  	//}
  	
  }

  public function fileCreate($filename,$content)
  {
    if(!file_exists($filename)){
      $fp  = fopen($filename,'wb');
      fwrite($fp,$content);
      fclose($fp); 
    }
    
  }

  public function fileNewCreate($filename,$content)
  {
    $newFile = 0;
    if(!file_exists($filename)){
      $fp  = fopen($filename,'wb');
      fwrite($fp,$content);
      fclose($fp);
      $newFile = 1; 
    }
    return $newFile;
    
  }

  /* Function : fileJSCreate 
  *  Params   : filename : string, content : string
  *  Output   : Creates a Javascript File 
  */
  public function fileJSCreate($filename,$content)
  {
    try{
        $newFile  =   0;
        $fp       =   fopen($filename,'wb');
        header('Content-Type: text/javascript');
        fwrite($fp,$content);
        fclose($fp);
        unset($fp);
        unset($content);
        $newFile = 1;
        return $newFile;
    }
    catch(Exception $ex){
        echo $ex->getMessage();
    }     
  }


  public function updateXml($directoryName,$scriptFolder,$scriptType,$scriptName,$content,$xmlFileName,$sysID,$updateTime){

    try{

      $restAPI        =   new REST_API; 
      $finalFileName  =   $directoryName."/".$scriptType."/".$scriptName;

      $restAPI->fileWCreate($finalFileName,$content);
      $objDOM1        = new DOMDocument();
      $objDOM1->load($xmlFileName);
      $xml                =   simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);
      $storedFolderName   =   $scriptFolder;
      $insertfilesCounter =   count($xml->$storedFolderName->files);
      $updateVal          =   0; 
      for($insertkey=0;$insertkey<$insertfilesCounter;$insertkey++)
        {
          if($xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_id == $sysID){
              $mTimearray = stat($finalFileName);
              $xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_updated_on = $updateTime;
              $xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->mTime = $mTimearray['mtime'];
              $xml->asXML($xmlFileName);
              $updateVal = 1;
              break;
          }
        }

      return $updateVal;    

    }catch(Exception $ex){

    }
      

}

function updateDeltaFile($deltaFile,$sysID,$createdTime,$updatedTime){

    $deltaVal   = 0;

    try{

      $xmlFile    =   $deltaFile;
      $objDOM1    =   new DOMDocument();
      $objDOM1->load($xmlFile);
      $xml = simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);
      if($xml->files->file != $sysID){
        $xml->files->file = $sysID;
        $xml->files->created = $createdTime;
        $xml->files->updated = $updatedTime;
        $xml->asXML($xmlFile);
        $deltaVal   = 1;
      }
      
    }
    catch(Exception $ex){
      $deltaVal   = 0;
    }

    return  $deltaVal;
    
}

function checkfileExists($xmlFile,$sysID,$updatedTime,$folderName){

  $objDOM1  = new DOMDocument();
  $objDOM1->load($xmlFile);
  $xml      = simplexml_import_dom($objDOM1);
  $storedFolderName = $folderName;
  $insertfilesCounter = count($xml->$storedFolderName->files);
  $returnfileName = '';

  for($insertkey=0;$insertkey<$insertfilesCounter;$insertkey++)
    {
      if($xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_id == $sysID){
            if($updatedTime > $xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->sys_updated_on)
                      $returnfileName = $xml->$storedFolderName->files[$insertkey]->file;
                     else
                      $returnFileName = 'NValid';
          break;
      }

    }
  return $returnfileName; 
}  

}

?></file_content><file_name>rest_call.php</file_name><path>acr</path><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareeshhere</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-05 16:24:57</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c7b3c840db42f20043abfd441d961938</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources_c7b3c840db42f20043abfd441d961938</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-06 06:53:42</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_acr_sources></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_scripts</applied_to><definition><![CDATA[//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
//     meta: {
//         docs: {
//             description: "disallow the use of empty blocks definations",
//             category: "Block",
//             recommended: true
//         },

//         schema: [{
//             type: "object",
//             properties: {
//                 typeof: {
//                     type: "boolean"
//                 }
//             },
//             additionalProperties: false
//         }]
//     },

//     create(context) {
//         const options = context.options[0];
//         var funcInfoStack = [];
//         const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;


        return {
            "Literal:exit" (node) {

                var regex = /[0-9a-z]{32}/;

                if (node && node.value && regex.test(node.value)) {
                    context.report(node, " don't use sys_id in code");
                }

                
            }

        }

   // }
};
]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0013</number><rule_description>Hardcoded SysID</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_HARDCODED_SYSID</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-11 07:52:55</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f4bdd9f36f59b20067a8c8c17c3ee4ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0013</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_f4bdd9f36f59b20067a8c8c17c3ee4ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 12:37:24</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
	//     meta: {
		//         docs: {
			//             description: "disallow the use of empty blocks definations",
			//             category: "Block",
			//             recommended: true
			//         },
			
			//         schema: [
			//             {
				//                 type: "object",
				//                 properties: {
					//                     typeof: {
						//                         type: "boolean"
						//                     }
						//                 },
						//                 additionalProperties: false
						//             }
						//         ]
						//     },
						
						//     create(context) {
							//         const options = context.options[0];
							//         var funcInfoStack = [];
							//         const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;
							
							
							return {
								CallExpression(node) {
									if(node && node.type && node.callee && node.callee.name && node.type === 'CallExpression' && node.callee.name === 'eval'){
										context.report(node.callee, 'Do not use eval in a script.');
									}
								}
								
							}
							
							// }
						};
						]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0008</number><rule_description>No script should use the eval() method as a best practices.</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_EVAL</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-14 11:30:54</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9f6d2d384fedf2004172fc728110c776</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0008</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_9f6d2d384fedf2004172fc728110c776</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 13:19:10</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_acr_sources"><x_snc_rcr_acr_sources action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><environment>windows</environment><file_content><?php
error_reporting(0);
include_once('acr/include.php');
include_once('acr/basic_functions.php');
include_once('acr/rest_call.php');

class ACR{

	protected $argument;
	protected $pathName;
	protected $bFuncObj;
	protected $restAPI;
	protected $eslintFile = ".eslintrc.json";
	protected $ruleTable  = "x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules";
	protected $ruleTable1 = "x_snc_rcr_code_review_rule_conditions"; 
	

	/** Init ***/
	/*
    *   Initialize the variables
    *   Now grab the command line arguments  
	*/
	public function __construct(){

	}

	/** Fuction Executes Here ***/
	/*
    *   Function :	Execute
    *	Params   : 	Null
    *   Output   :  Create the scripts and Rules in the local system  
	*/
	public function execute($argv){

		$this->argument 	= 	$argv;
		$this->bFuncObj 	= 	new BasicFunction;
		$this->restAPI 		=	new REST_API;
		//Check the total number of arguments
		$filecount 			= 	count($this->argument);
		
		if($filecount == 5){

			$errorFlag = "";			
			try{

				$directoryList 		= 	explode(",",$this->argument[4]);
				$this->pathName		=   'acrfolder';

				if(file_exists($this->pathName)){
					if(substr(PHP_OS,0,3) == "WIN")
						exec('rmdir /S/Q '.$this->pathName);
					else
						exec('rm -rf '.$this->pathName);
				}


				//Checks whether the Folder is writable
				if (!file_exists($this->pathName)) {	

					mkdir($this->pathName."/",0777);

					if(!is_writable($this->pathName)){
						echo "Error: Folder is Not writable\n";
					
					exit(0);
					}

					//Assign the values
					$username 		= 	$this->argument[1];
					$password 		= 	$this->argument[2];
					$baseString  	=   base64_encode($username.':'.$password);
					$instance    	=   $this->argument[3];
					$apiScript   	=   'api/now/table';
					$eslastquery  	= 	$this->ruleTable."?sysparm_query=active=true^ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on&sysparm_limit=1";
					$delastquery  	= 	"sys_update_version?sysparm_query=ORDERBYDESCsys_updated_on&sysparm_fields=sys_id,sys_created_on,sys_updated_on,name&sysparm_limit=1";

					//Constructing the URL		
					$serverURL    	=    $instance."/".$apiScript."/".$eslastquery;
					$dserverURL    	=    $instance."/".$apiScript."/".$delastquery;				
					$response    	=    $this->restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverURL);
			        $obj         	=    json_decode($response,true);		        		

			        //Checking the Code Review Rules exists in the current instance
			        if($obj['error']['message'])
			        	$ruleAvailable = 0;
			        else
			        	$ruleAvailable = 1;

					//Create Configuration.php
					$content  = $this->bFuncObj->configurationSetting($this->pathName,$instance,$username,$password,$directoryList,$ruleAvailable); 
					$confFlag =	$this->bFuncObj->fileCreate('acr/configuration.php',$content);
					
					if($confFlag == 1){
						
						//Appending include.php
						$includepath = 'acr/include.php';
						$fp = fopen($includepath,"w");
						$getcontent = "<?php \n include_once('acr/configuration.php');\n ?>";
						fputs($fp,$getcontent);
						fclose($fp);
						

						//Create Script Type Folder and Files
						$deltaFile 		= 	$this->pathName."/delta.xml";
						$eslintFile 	= 	$this->pathName."/eslint.xml";
						$xmlFile 		= 	$this->pathName."/configuration.xml";
						$directoryName 	= 	$this->pathName;
						$folderCount 	= 	count($directoryList);
						$folderArr 		= 	array();

						for($k = 0; $k < $folderCount; $k++){
							$folderArr[$k] = $directoryName."/".$directoryList[$k];
						}

						$globals 		= 	$this->download($directoryName,$deltaFile,$folderCount,$baseString,$instance,$apiScript,$folderArr,$xmlFile);

						if($globals != "," || $globals != " ")
							$this->bFuncObj->applyGlobalRulesinEslint($folderArr,$globals,$this->eslintFile);
						
		        		$val = 1;
		        		mkdir($directoryName."/rules/",0777);

		        		if($ruleAvailable == 1){
		
							$this->bFuncObj->EsLintRules($this->ruleTable,$instance,$apiScript,$baseString,$directoryName."/rules/",$folderArr,$globals);
							$this->bFuncObj->configureRules($this->ruleTable1,$instance,$apiScript,$baseString,$directoryName."/rules/",$folderArr);

							//$val = $this->bFuncObj->FileXMLCreate($baseString,$serverURL,$eslintFile);
							//$val = $this->bFuncObj->FileXMLCreate($baseString,$dserverURL,$deltaFile);
							//echo "Code Review Rules Created\n";
						}
						else{
							//echo "Code Review Rules Table does not exist\n";
						}
						
						if($val == 1)
							echo "Code Review Initial Configuration Page has been setup\n";
						else
							echo "Error while downloading\n";
					}
					else{
						echo "Error : Can't create initial configuration setting\n";
					}		
				

					}
					else{
						echo "Error : Folder Already Exists.\n";
					}
				}
				catch(Exception $ex){
					echo $ex->getMessage();
				}
			//}
		}
		else{
			echo "Error: Format php acr.php username password instancename scripttype1,scripttype2\n";
		}

	}

   
	/*
    *   Function :	download
    *	Params   : 	folderName : string, deltaFile : string, countFolder : integer, baseString : string....
    *   Output   :  Create the script and update the configuration.xml 
	*/	
  public function download($folderName,$deltaFile,$countFolder,$baseString,$instance,$apiScript,$folderArr,$xmlFile){

	$componentArray 	= 	$this->bFuncObj->componentArray();
    $dom                =   new DomDocument("1.0", "UTF-8");
    $xmlfileNameTag     =   $dom->createElement('slint');
    $dom->appendChild($xmlfileNameTag);

    $globals      = "";

    for($key =  0; $key <  $countFolder; $key++)
       {
           $foldername    =   'folder'.$key;
           $folderVal     =    substr(strrchr($folderArr[$key], "/"),1);

            $serverURL    =    $instance."/".$apiScript."/".$componentArray[$folderVal];
            $response     =    $this->restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverURL);
            $obj          =    json_decode($response,true);
            $totalFiles   =    count($obj["result"]);

            //$finalCount   =    $totalFiles;
            $finalCount   =    5;
            $folderNameTag  =   $dom->createElement($foldername);
            $xmlfileNameTag->appendChild($folderNameTag);  
            

          for($file = 0; $file < $finalCount; $file++)
            { 
              $filesTag     = $dom->createElement('files');
              $folderNameTag->appendChild($filesTag);
    
                
                if($obj['result'][$file]['active'] == true || $obj['result'][$file]['name'] == 'true')
                {
                  
                  $origfile   =   $obj['result'][$file]['name'];
                  $filename   =   $origfile;
                  if(strlen($origfile)>15)
                    $filename = substr($origfile,0,14);

                    $filename = str_replace(' ', '_', $filename);


                    $finalFileWExt  =   $filename."_".$obj['result'][$file]['sys_id'].".js";
                    $finalFileName  =   $folderArr[$key]."/".$finalFileWExt;
                    
                    if(trim($finalFileWExt) != "_.js"){

	                    $apiURL         =   $serverURL."/".$obj['result'][$file]['sys_id'];
	                    $fileResponse   =   $this->restAPI->getRESTAPI($baseString,$apiURL);
	                    $jsonObj   		= 	json_decode($fileResponse,true);        
	                    

	                    $this->restAPI->fileCreate($finalFileName,$jsonObj['result']['script']);

	                    $modifiedarray = stat($finalFileName);

	                    if($componentArray[$folderVal] == 'sys_script_include' || $componentArray[$folderVal] == 'sys_ui_script')
	                    	$globals .= $obj['result'][$file]['name'].",";

	                    $fileTag      = $dom->createElement('file',$finalFileWExt); 
	                    $sysIDTag     = $dom->createElement('sys_id',$jsonObj['result']['sys_id']);
	                    $createdTag   = @$dom->createElement('sys_created_on',strtotime($jsonObj['result']['sys_created_on']));
	                    $updatedTag   = @$dom->createElement('sys_updated_on',strtotime($jsonObj['result']['sys_updated_on']));
	                    $modifiedTag  = $dom->createElement('mTime',$modifiedarray['mtime']);
	                    $cTimeTag     = $dom->createElement('cTime',$modifiedarray['ctime']);

	                    $filesTag->appendChild($fileTag);
	                    $filesTag->appendChild($sysIDTag);
	                    $filesTag->appendChild($createdTag);
	                    $filesTag->appendChild($updatedTag);
	                    $filesTag->appendChild($modifiedTag);
	                    $filesTag->appendChild($cTimeTag);

	                    flush();
                	}
                  
                }

              }
              $elsintFArr = 'acr/beslintrc.json';
              $strContent = file_get_contents($elsintFArr);
              $esfilename = $folderArr[$key]."/.eslintrc.json";
              $this->restAPI->fileCreate($esfilename,$strContent); 

              //echo $this->bFuncObj->folderArrayIndex($componentArray[$folderVal])." downloaded\n";
          
          } 
          $dom->formatOutput = true;
          $dom->save($xmlFile);
          unset($dom);
          return $globals;
      }

  	}

$acr = 	new ACR;
$acr->execute($argv);


?></file_content><file_name>acr.php</file_name><path>acr</path><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareeshhere</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-05 16:16:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>28d18040db42f20043abfd441d961926</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources_28d18040db42f20043abfd441d961926</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-06 06:52:40</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_acr_sources></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>sys_script_include</applied_to><definition><![CDATA[module.exports = function(context) {
  return {
	MemberExpression(node) {
    	if(node.property && node.property.type =='Identifier' && node.property.name=='prototype' && node.object && node.object.type == 'Identifier'){
        	 context.report(node, 'Script Include name should start with only the allowed prefixes(SLS,MKT,PP,PS)');
        }
    }
  };
};
]]></definition><is_oob>false</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>RULE0118</number><rule_description>This rule will ensure ....</rule_description><rule_name>ALLOW_ONLY_PREFIXED_SCRIPT_INCLUDES</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-13 11:24:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5f9b48a2dbce760043abfd441d961996</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RULE0118</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_5f9b48a2dbce760043abfd441d961996</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-17 10:40:09</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3ea5c309dbe9b20043abfd441d96199e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_rcr.ValidateCodeReviewPayload</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ValidateCodeReviewPayload</name><script><![CDATA[var ValidateCodeReviewPayload = Class.create();
ValidateCodeReviewPayload.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},
	
	/*
 	* @param mode
 	*      Mode = 1 implies Story level validation
 	*      Mode = 2 implies Update Set validation
 	*      Mode = 3 implies File level validation
 	*/
	validate: function(gr) {

		gs.info(['sys_script_include','sys_script','sys_script_client'].indexOf(gr.getTableName()));
		var prevResults = new GlideRecord('x_snc_rcr_review_results');
		if(gr.getTableName() == 'x_snc_rcr_review_request') {
			prevResults.addQuery('review_request', gr.sys_id);
			prevResults.query();			
			prevResults.isnew = false;
			prevResults.updateMultiple();
			
			this.validateStory(gr);
		}else if(gr.getTableName() == 'sys_update_set') {
			prevResults.addQuery('update_set', gr.sys_id);
			prevResults.query();			
			prevResults.isnew = false;
			prevResults.updateMultiple();
			
			this.validateUpdateSet(gr);
		}else if(['sys_script_include','sys_script','sys_script_client'].indexOf(gr.getTableName()) > -1) {
			prevResults.addQuery('file_sys_id', gr.sys_id);
			prevResults.query();			
			prevResults.isnew = false;
			prevResults.updateMultiple();			
			
			this.validateFile(gr);
		}		
	},
	
	validateFile: function(current) {
		var lastRunTime = Date.now().toString();
		var val,nameChunks;
		
		var acrTotalCommandString = '<parameters>';
		var eslintCommand = '<parameter name="name" value="php acr/codereview.php ';
		var payloadMap = {};
		if(current.sys_class_name.indexOf('sys_script_client') != -1){
			payloadMap['ClientScripts'] = current.sys_id + '';
		}else if(current.sys_class_name.indexOf('sys_script_include') != -1){
			payloadMap['ScriptIncludes'] = current.sys_id + '';
		}else if(current.sys_class_name.indexOf('sys_script') != -1){
			payloadMap['BusinessRules'] = current.sys_id + '';
		}else if(current.sys_class_name.indexOf('sys_ui_script') != -1){
			payloadMap['UIScripts'] = current.sys_id + '';
		}else if(current.sys_class_name.indexOf('catalog_script_client') != -1){
			payloadMap['CatalogClientScripts'] = current.sys_id + '';
		}else if(current.sys_class_name.indexOf('sysevent_script_action') != -1){
			payloadMap['ScriptActions'] = current.sys_id + '';
		}
		
		
		eslintCommand += encodeURI(JSON.stringify(payloadMap)) +'"/>';
		
		var runningIDParam = '<parameter name="runningID" value ="'+lastRunTime+'"/>';
		acrTotalCommandString += eslintCommand+runningIDParam+'</parameters>';
		this.pushPayload2ECCQueue(acrTotalCommandString);
	},
	
	validateStory: function(current) {
		
		var lastRunTime = Date.now().toString();
		var val,nameChunks;
// 		var reviewNumber = current.sys_id+'';
		var updateSets = current.update_set_s.split(',');
		if(updateSets.length < 1){
			gs.addErrorMessage('No update sets available to RUN ACR');
		}else{
			current.last_run_time = lastRunTime;
			current.update();
		}
		
		if(updateSets) {
			for(var set in updateSets){
				// 	gs.addInfoMessage('adsfsdf '+us.update_set.name);
				
				var updateXml = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
				updateXml.addQuery('update_set',updateSets[set]);
				updateXml.addEncodedQuery();
				var queryString = "type=Business Rule^ORtype=Client Script^ORtype=Script Include";
				//  var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
				
				updateXml.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
				updateXml.query();
				var acrTotalCommandString = '<parameters>';
				var eslintCommand = '<parameter name="name" value="php acr/codereview.php ';
				var payloadMap = {};
				var hasPayload = false;
				while(updateXml.next()){
					if(updateXml.name.indexOf('sys_script_client') != -1){
						hasPayload = true;
						nameChunks = updateXml.name.split('_');
						val = payloadMap['ClientScripts'];
						if(!val){
							payloadMap['ClientScripts'] = nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1] + '';
						}else{
							payloadMap['ClientScripts'] = val + ',' + nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1];
						}
					}else if(updateXml.name.indexOf('sys_script_include') != -1){
						hasPayload = true;
						nameChunks =  updateXml.name.split('_');
						val = payloadMap['ScriptIncludes'];
						if(!val){
							payloadMap['ScriptIncludes'] = nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1] + '';
						}else{
							payloadMap['ScriptIncludes'] = val + ',' + nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1];
						}
					}else if(updateXml.name.indexOf('sys_script') != -1){
						hasPayload = true;
						nameChunks =  updateXml.name.split('_');
						val = payloadMap['BusinessRules'];
						if(!val){
							payloadMap['BusinessRules'] = nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1] + '';
						}else{
							payloadMap['BusinessRules'] = val + ',' + nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1];
						}
					}
				}
				if(hasPayload){									
					eslintCommand += encodeURI(JSON.stringify(payloadMap)) + '"/>';

					var updateSetParam = '<parameter name="updateset" value ="'+updateSets[set]+'"/>';
					var storyParam = '<parameter name="story" value ="'+current.story_number+'"/>';
					var reviewNumparam = '<parameter name ="reviewNum" value ="'+current.sys_id+'"/>';

					var runningIDParam = '<parameter name="runningID" value ="'+lastRunTime+'"/>';
					acrTotalCommandString += eslintCommand+updateSetParam+storyParam+runningIDParam+reviewNumparam+'</parameters>';

					this.pushPayload2ECCQueue(acrTotalCommandString);
				}
				
			}
		}
		
	},
	
	validateUpdateSet: function(current) {
		gs.info('In validateUpdateSet.');
		var lastRunTime = Date.now().toString();
		var val,nameChunks;
		
		var updateXml = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
		updateXml.addQuery('update_set',current.sys_id);
		updateXml.addEncodedQuery();
		var queryString = "type=Business Rule^ORtype=Client Script^ORtype=Script Include";
		updateXml.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
		updateXml.query();
		var acrTotalCommandString = '<parameters>';
		var eslintCommand = '<parameter name="name" value="php acr/codereview.php ';
		var payloadMap = {};
		while(updateXml.next()){
			if(updateXml.name.indexOf('sys_script_client') != -1){
				hasPayload = true;
				nameChunks = updateXml.name.split('_');
				val = payloadMap['ClientScripts'];
				if(!val){
					payloadMap['ClientScripts'] = nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1] + '';
				}else{
					payloadMap['ClientScripts'] = val + ',' + nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1];
				}
			}else if(updateXml.name.indexOf('sys_script_include') != -1){
				hasPayload = true;
				nameChunks =  updateXml.name.split('_');
				val = payloadMap['ScriptIncludes'];
				if(!val){
					payloadMap['ScriptIncludes'] = nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1] + '';
				}else{
					payloadMap['ScriptIncludes'] = val + ',' + nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1];
				}
			}else if(updateXml.name.indexOf('sys_script') != -1){
				hasPayload = true;
				nameChunks =  updateXml.name.split('_');
				val = payloadMap['BusinessRules'];
				if(!val){
					payloadMap['BusinessRules'] = nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1] + '';
				}else{
					payloadMap['BusinessRules'] = val + ',' + nameChunks[nameChunks.length-1];
				}
			}
		}			
			
		eslintCommand += encodeURI(JSON.stringify(payloadMap)) + '"/>';
		var updateSetParam = '<parameter name="updateset" value ="'+current.sys_id+'"/>';

		var runningIDParam = '<parameter name="runningID" value ="'+lastRunTime+'"/>';
		acrTotalCommandString += eslintCommand+updateSetParam+runningIDParam+'</parameters>';

		this.pushPayload2ECCQueue(acrTotalCommandString);
		
	},
	
	pushPayload2ECCQueue: function(Payload) {
		// submitting the ecc queue job for one update set.
		var queue = new GlideRecord('ecc_queue');
		
		queue.initialize();
		queue.topic = 'Command';
		queue.queue = 'output';
		
		queue.agent = this.getActiveMidAgentName();
		if(queue.agent == '-1'){
			gs.addErrorMessage('No Active MID server message');
		}
		queue.payload= Payload;
		
		queue.insert();
	},
	
	getActiveMidAgentName: function() {
		var agent = new GlideRecord('ecc_agent');
		var midserverName ='mid.server.';
		agent.initialize();
		agent.addQuery('name',gs.getProperty('x_snc_rcr.ESLintMid'));
		agent.addQuery('status','up');
		agent.query();
		if(agent.next()){
			midserverName += agent.name;
		}else{
			midserverName = '-1';
		}
		return midserverName;
	},
	
	type: 'ValidateCodeReviewPayload'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-15 12:50:37</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3ea5c309dbe9b20043abfd441d96199e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValidateCodeReviewPayload</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3ea5c309dbe9b20043abfd441d96199e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 12:28:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>sys_script_client</applied_to><definition><![CDATA[//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
//     meta: {
//         docs: {
//             description: "disallow the use of empty blocks definations",
//             category: "Block",
//             recommended: true
//         },

//         schema: [{
//             type: "object",
//             properties: {
//                 typeof: {
//                     type: "boolean"
//                 }
//             },
//             additionalProperties: false
//         }]
//     },

//     create(context) {
//         const options = context.options[0];
//         var funcInfoStack = [];
//         const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;


        return {
            Program(node) {
				
			 if(node && node.body){
                var count = 0;
                for (var i = 0; i < node.body.length; i++) {
                    if (node.body[i].type == "FunctionDeclaration") {
                        count++;
                    }
                }
                if (count == 0) {
                    context.report(node, ' function declaration not found');
                }
            }
		 }
			
        }

   // }
};
]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0012</number><rule_description>Client Scripts should define a function()</rule_description><rule_name>USE_FUNCTION_IN_CLIENTSCRIPTS</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-14 11:29:17</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>ee0d6d784fedf2004172fc728110c702</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0012</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_ee0d6d784fedf2004172fc728110c702</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 12:40:40</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: x_snc_rcr_acr_sources_5f430840db42f20043abfd441d9619c1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_acr_sources"><x_snc_rcr_acr_sources action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><environment>windows</environment><file_content><?php

include('acr/include.php');
include('acr/basic_functions.php');
include('acr/rest_call.php');

class GlobalSync{

	protected $table = 'x_snc_rcr_eslintglobals';

	public function execute(){

	
		$phpTree    =   new CLint;
		$bFunc 		=	new BasicFunction;
		$rest_call  =   new REST_API;

		$scriptArr  =   $bFunc->RuleScript();

		$globalArr	=	array();

		$baseString		=	 $bFunc->baseString();
		$serverURL 		=	 $bFunc->ServiceUrl($this->table);

		$sys_ver_response   =   $rest_call->getRESTAPI($baseString,$serverURL);
		$downobj      	    =   json_decode($sys_ver_response,true);

		$countResult 	=	count($downobj[result]);
		for($key = 0; $key < $countResult; $key++)
		{

			$applied_string = $downobj[result][$key]['appliedto'];
			$appliedArr     = explode(",",$applied_string);

			for($appliedcnt = 0; $appliedcnt < count($appliedArr); $appliedcnt++){
				$scriptTypeArr = $scriptArr[$appliedArr[$appliedcnt]];

				for($i = 0; $i<count($scriptTypeArr);$i++){
					$globalArr[$scriptTypeArr[$i]][$downobj[result][$key]['globalidentifier']] = 1;
				}

			} 
		}
		unset($downobj);
		unset($sys_ver_response);
		unset($serverURL);
		unset($baseString);

		for($foldercnt = 0;$foldercnt < $phpTree->folderCount; $foldercnt++ )
		{
			$folderVal = "folder".$foldercnt;

			$finalFolder = substr($phpTree->$folderVal,strrpos($phpTree->$folderVal,"/")+1);
			foreach($globalArr as $key=>$val){
				if($key == $finalFolder)
				  {
				  	$eslintrj = $phpTree->$folderVal."/.eslintrc.json";
				  	//Read the content of the existing eslintrc
					$contentArr = 	$bFunc->readESlint($eslintrj);
					
					unset($contentArr['globals']);

					//update the global content in eslintrc
					foreach($globalArr[$key] as $key1=>$val1)
						$contentArr["globals"][$key1] = $val1;
						
					//Write the content
					$jsonContent = json_encode($contentArr);
					file_put_contents($eslintrj,$jsonContent);
				  }


			}
         
		}
	}

}


?></file_content><file_name>globalsync.php</file_name><path>acr</path><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>hareeshhere</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-05 16:23:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>5f430840db42f20043abfd441d9619c1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_acr_sources_5f430840db42f20043abfd441d9619c1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-06 07:06:04</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_acr_sources></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_8b6a11b1db82760043abfd441d96195d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules"><x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applied_to>all_client_scripts</applied_to><definition><![CDATA[//------------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Rule Definition
//------------------------------------------------------------------------------

module.exports = function(context){
  

   /* create(context) {
        const options = context.options[0];
        var funcInfoStack = [];
        const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false; */


        return {
            /*  Client-side code should not use GlideRecord.
        If GlideRecord is used with new keyword, then this will throw the error.
    */
            NewExpression (node) {
                if (node && node.callee && node.callee.name && node.callee.name === "GlideRecord") {
                    context.report(node, "Do not use GlideRecord in client script");
                }
            }


        }

   // }
};
]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Warning</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0016</number><rule_description>Do not use GlideRecord in client script</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_GlideRecord_IN_CLIENT_SCRIPTS</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>rahulraviprasad</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-04-11 09:14:07</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>8b6a11b1db82760043abfd441d96195d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0016</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_8b6a11b1db82760043abfd441d96195d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 14:47:16</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_rcr_acr_sources"><x_snc_rcr_acr_sources action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><environment>windows</environment><file_content><?php
error_reporting(0);
include('acr/globalsync.php');

$glob = new GlobalSync;
$glob->execute();

// Rule Definition

module.exports = function(context){
//     meta: {
//         docs: {

//             category: "Block",

//         },

//         schema: [
//             {

//                         type: "boolean"

//             }
//         ]
//     },

//     create(context) {
//         const options = context.options[0];
//         var funcInfoStack = [];
//         const considerTypeOf = options && options.typeof === true || false;
      
      
      return {
          "CallExpression:exit" (node) {  
   if (node && node.callee && node.callee.property != null &&  node.callee.property.name && node.callee.property.name == "getXMLWait") {          
        context.report(node.callee, 'Please change getXMLWait to getXML with a callback');          
   }   
  }
      }
      
    //  }
};
]]></definition><is_oob>true</is_oob><lint_level>Error</lint_level><mode>eslint</mode><number>SNOW0003</number><rule_description>Have we converted getXMLWait to getXML with a callback function?</rule_description><rule_name>AVOID_getXMLWait_IN_CLIENT_SCRIPTS</rule_name><sys_class_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-03-14 11:35:26</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>424e21b84fedf2004172fc728110c7ac</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNOW0003</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Rapid Code Review" source="x_snc_rcr">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Rapid Code Review">5501bca61315b240a5e739fed144b06d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules_424e21b84fedf2004172fc728110c7ac</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-04-13 13:35:35</sys_updated_on></x_snc_rcr_code_review_rules></record_update>
